adhkar.textAr: يُصَلِّي عَلَى النَّبِيِّ ﷺ بَعْدَ فَرَاغِهِ مِنْ إِجَابَةِ المُؤَذِّن
adhkar.textEn: Send blessings upon the Prophet (peace be upon him) after finishing repeating after the mu'adhin.
adhkar.benefitAr: الصلاة على النبي ﷺ بعد الأذان قبل الدعاء
adhkar.benefitEn: Sending blessings upon the Prophet after the Adhan before making dua

adhkar.textAr: يَقُولُ مِثْلَ مَا يَقُولُ الْمُؤَذِّنُ إِلاَّ فِي حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلاحِ فَيَقُولُ: لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ
adhkar.textEn: One should repeat what the mu'adhdhin says, except when he says 'Hayya 'alas-Salah' (hasten to the prayer) and 'Hayya 'alal-Falah' (hasten to success), one should say 'La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah' (there is no might and no power except by Allah).
adhkar.benefitAr: من قال مثل ما يقول المؤذن من قلبه دخل الجنة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says what the muezzin says from his heart will enter Paradise

translations.ar: يَقُولُ مِثْلَ مَا يَقُولُ الْمُؤَذِّنُ إِلاَّ فِي حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلاحِ فَيَقُولُ: لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللهِ

adhkar.textAr: وَأَنا أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَه، وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسولُه، رَضيتُ بِاللهِ رَبَّاً، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ رَسولاً، وَبِالإِسْلامِ دينا
adhkar.textEn: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner, and that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger. I am pleased with Allah as Lord, with Muhammad as Messenger, and with Islam as religion.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال بعد شهادة المؤذن. تُغفر ذنوبه
adhkar.benefitEn: To be recited after the mu'adhdhin's testimony. His sins will be forgiven

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْـوَةِ التّامَّة، وَالصَّلاةِ القائِمَة، آتِ مُحَمَّداً الوَسيلَةَ وَالْفَضيلَة، وَابْعَثْهُ مَقاماً مَحموداً الَّذي وَعَدْتَه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Lord of this perfect call and established prayer, grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها حلَّت له شفاعتي يوم القيامة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever recites this will be granted my intercession on the Day of Resurrection

adhkar.textAr: يَدْعو لِنَفْسِهِ بَيْنَ الأَذانِ وَالإِقامَةِ فَإِنَّ الدُّعاءَ لا يُرَد
adhkar.textEn: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء بين الأذان والإقامة لا يُرد
adhkar.benefitEn: Supplication between the Adhan and Iqamah is not rejected

translations.ar: يَدْعو لِنَفْسِهِ بَيْنَ الأَذانِ وَالإِقامَةِ فَإِنَّ الدُّعاءَ لا يُرَد
translations.en: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.fr: On devrait faire des invocations pour soi-même entre l'Adhan et l'Iqamah car une telle invocation n'est pas rejetée.
translations.de: Man sollte zwischen dem Adhan und der Iqamah für sich selbst bitten, da ein solches Bittgebet nicht abgelehnt wird.
translations.es: Uno debe suplicar por sí mismo durante el tiempo entre el Adhan y el Iqamah ya que tal súplica no es rechazada.
translations.pt: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.pt-BR: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.it: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.nl: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.pl: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.ru: Следует просить за себя в промежуток между азаном и икамой, поскольку такая мольба не отвергается.
translations.uk: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.tr: Ezan ile kamet arasında kişi kendisi için dua etmelidir, çünkü bu dua reddedilmez.
translations.id: Seseorang hendaknya berdoa untuk dirinya antara adzan dan iqamah karena doa tersebut tidak ditolak.
translations.ms: Seseorang hendaklah berdoa untuk dirinya antara azan dan iqamah kerana doa tersebut tidak ditolak.
translations.bn: আযান ও ইকামাতের মধ্যবর্তী সময়ে নিজের জন্য দোয়া করা উচিত কারণ এই দোয়া প্রত্যাখ্যান করা হয় না।
translations.hi: अज़ान और इक़ामत के बीच अपने लिए दुआ करनी चाहिए क्योंकि यह दुआ रद नहीं होती।
translations.ur: اذان اور اقامت کے درمیان انسان کو اپنے لیے دعا کرنی چاہیے کیونکہ یہ دعا رد نہیں ہوتی۔
translations.fa: بین اذان و اقامه باید برای خود دعا کرد زیرا این دعا رد نمی‌شود.
translations.ku: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.sw: Mtu anapaswa kuomba dua kwa ajili yake mwenyewe wakati kati ya Adhana na Iqamah kwani dua hiyo haikataliwa.
translations.ha: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.so: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.am: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.sq: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.bs: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.ro: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.el: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.th: ควรขอพรให้ตัวเองระหว่างอะซานและอิกอมะฮ์ เพราะการขอพรนั้นจะไม่ถูกปฏิเสธ
translations.vi: Người ta nên cầu nguyện cho bản thân trong khoảng thời gian giữa Adhan và Iqamah vì lời cầu nguyện đó sẽ không bị từ chối.
translations.tl: One should supplicate for himself during the time between the Adhan and the Iqamah as such a supplication is not rejected.
translations.ja: アザーンとイカーマの間に自分のために祈るべきです。そのような祈りは拒否されません。
translations.ko: 아잔과 이까마 사이에 자신을 위해 기도해야 합니다. 그러한 기도는 거부되지 않습니다.
translations.zh-Hans: 在宣礼和成拜词之间应为自己祈祷，因为这样的祈祷不会被拒绝。
translations.zh-Hant: 在宣禮和成拜詞之間應為自己祈禱，因為這樣的祈禱不會被拒絕。

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَهُ، لَهُ المُلْكُ وَلَهُ الحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدير، لا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلاّ بِاللّهِ، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ، وَلا نَعْبُدُ إِلاّ إِيّاهُ، لَهُ النِّعْمَةُ وَلَهُ الفَضْلُ وَلَهُ الثَّناءُ الحَسَنُ، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ مُخْلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الكافِرون
adhkar.textEn: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. There is no might and no power except with Allah. There is no god but Allah, and we worship none but Him. His is the grace, His is the bounty, and to Him belongs the most excellent praise. There is no god but Allah, sincere in devotion to Him, even though the disbelievers may detest it.
adhkar.benefitAr: يُقال بعد كل صلاة مكتوبة
adhkar.benefitEn: Said after every obligatory prayer

translations.ar: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَهُ، لَهُ المُلْكُ وَلَهُ الحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدير، لا حَوْلَ وَلا قُوَّةَ إِلاّ بِاللّهِ، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ، وَلا نَعْبُدُ إِلاّ إِيّاهُ، لَهُ النِّعْمَةُ وَلَهُ الفَضْلُ وَلَهُ الثَّناءُ الحَسَنُ، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ مُخْلِصينَ لَهُ الدّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الكافِرون
translations.en: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. There is no might and no power except with Allah. There is no god but Allah, and we worship none but Him. His is the grace, His is the bounty, and to Him belongs the most excellent praise. There is no god but Allah, sincere in devotion to Him, even though the disbelievers may detest it.

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لَهُ، لَهُ المُلْكُ وَلَهُ الحَمْدُ يُحْيي وَيُميتُ وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدير
adhkar.textEn: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, He gives life and causes death, and He is over all things omnipotent.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال عشر مرات بعد صلاة المغرب والفجر

adhkar.textAr: أَسْتَغْفِرُ الله
adhkar.textEn: I seek the forgiveness of Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: الاستغفار ثلاثاً بعد الصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking forgiveness three times after prayer

translations.ar: أَسْتَغْفِرُ الله
translations.en: I seek the forgiveness of Allah.
translations.fr: Je demande pardon à Allah.
translations.de: Ich bitte Allah um Vergebung.
translations.es: Pido perdón a Allah.
translations.pt: Peço perdão a Allah.
translations.pt-BR: Peço perdão a Allah.
translations.it: Chiedo perdono ad Allah.
translations.nl: Ik vraag Allah om vergeving.
translations.pl: Proszę Allaha o przebaczenie.
translations.ru: Прошу прощения у Аллаха.
translations.uk: Прошу прощення у Аллаха.
translations.tr: Allah'tan bağışlanma dilerim.
translations.id: Aku memohon ampunan kepada Allah.
translations.ms: Aku memohon ampunan kepada Allah.
translations.bn: আমি আল্লাহর কাছে ক্ষমা চাই।
translations.hi: मैं अल्लाह से क्षमा माँगता हूँ।
translations.ur: میں اللہ سے معافی مانگتا ہوں۔
translations.fa: از خدا طلب آمرزش می‌کنم.
translations.ku: Ez ji Xwedê lêborînê dixwazim.
translations.sw: Ninaomba msamaha kwa Allah.
translations.ha: Ina neman gafarar Allah.
translations.so: Waxaan ka codsanayaa Ilaah cafis.
translations.am: ከአላህ ይቅርታ እጠይቃለሁ።
translations.sq: Kërkoj falje nga Allahu.
translations.bs: Tražim oprost od Allaha.
translations.ro: Cer iertare de la Allah.
translations.el: Ζητώ συγχώρεση από τον Αλλάχ.
translations.th: ฉันขออภัยจากอัลลอฮ์
translations.vi: Tôi cầu xin Allah tha thứ.
translations.tl: Humihingi ako ng kapatawaran sa Allah.
translations.ja: アッラーに許しを求めます。
translations.ko: 알라에게 용서를 구합니다.
translations.zh-Hans: 我向真主求饶恕。
translations.zh-Hant: 我向真主求饒恕。
translations.ps: زه له الله څخه بخښنه غواړم.
translations.uz: Allohdan mag'firat so'rayman.
translations.kk: Мен Аллаһтан кешірім сұраймын.
translations.az: Allahdan bağışlanma diləyirəm.
translations.fil: Humihingi ako ng kapatawaran sa Allah.
translations.jv: Aku nyuwun pangapura marang Allah.
translations.ml: ഞാൻ അല്ലാഹുവിനോട് മാപ്പ് ചോദിക്കുന്നു.
translations.my: ကျွန်တော် အလ္လာဟ်ထံ ခွင့်လွှတ်ရန် တောင်းပန်ပါ၏။
translations.nb: Jeg ber Allah om tilgivelse.
translations.pa: ਮੈਂ ਅੱਲ੍ਹਾ ਤੋਂ ਮਾਫ਼ੀ ਮੰਗਦਾ ਹਾਂ।
translations.ta: நான் அல்லாஹ்விடம் மன்னிப்பு கேட்கிறேன்.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلامُ وَمِـنْكَ السَّلام، تَبارَكْتَ يا ذا الجَـلالِ وَالإِكْـرام
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Owner of majesty and honor.

adhkar.textAr: لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لهُ المُـلْكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، وهُوَ على كُلّ شَيءٍ قَدير، اللّهُـمَّ لا مانِعَ لِما أَعْطَـيْت، وَلا مُعْطِـيَ لِما مَنَـعْت، وَلا يَنْفَـعُ ذا الجَـدِّ مِنْـكَ الجَـد
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He is Able to do all things. O Allah, there is none who can withhold what You give, and none may give what You have withheld; and the might of the mighty person cannot benefit him against You.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها بعد كل صلاة غُفرت خطاياه وإن كانت مثل زبد البحر
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this after every prayer, his sins will be forgiven even if they were like the foam of the sea

translations.ar: لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لهُ المُـلْكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، وهُوَ على كُلّ شَيءٍ قَدير، اللّهُـمَّ لا مانِعَ لِما أَعْطَـيْت، وَلا مُعْطِـيَ لِما مَنَـعْت، وَلا يَنْفَـعُ ذا الجَـدِّ مِنْـكَ الجَـد

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ (٢٥٥)
adhkar.textEn: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها دُبُر كل صلاة لم يكن بينه وبين الجنة إلا الموت
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever recites this after every prayer, nothing will stand between him and Paradise except death

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

translations.ms: Allah! There is none worthy of ibadat but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

adhkar.textAr: مَا مِنْ عَبْدٍ يُذْنِبُ ذَنْبًا فَيَقُومُ فَيَتَوَضَّأُ ثُمَّ يُصَلِّي ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ إِلاّ غَفَرَ اللهُ لَهُ
adhkar.textEn: No slave commits a sin then gets up, performs ablution, prays, then seeks Allah's forgiveness, except that Allah forgives him.
adhkar.benefitAr: التوبة والاستغفار بعد الذنب مع الوضوء والصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: Repentance and seeking forgiveness after sin with ablution and prayer

adhkar.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ الَّتِي لا يُجَاوِزُهُنَّ بَرٌّ وَلا فَاجِرٌ، مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ وَبَرَأَ وَذَرَأَ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا يَنْزِلُ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا، وَمِنْ شَرِّ مَا ذَرَأَ فِي الأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا، وَمِنْ شَرِّ فِتَنِ اللَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ، وَمِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ طَارِقٍ إِلاّ طَارِقاً يَطْرُقُ بِخَيْرٍ يَا رَحْمَنُ
adhkar.textEn: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah which no righteous or wicked person can transgress, from the evil of what He created, formed, and originated, from the evil of what descends from the sky and what ascends to it, from the evil of what He spread in the earth and what comes out of it, from the evil of the tribulations of night and day, and from the evil of every visitor except one that visits with good, O Most Merciful.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء شامل للحماية من كيد الشياطين المردة
adhkar.benefitEn: Comprehensive dua for protection against rebellious devils

adhkar.textAr: ضَعْ يَدَكَ عَلَى الَّذِي تَأْلَمُ مِنْ جَسَدِكَ وَقُلْ: بِسْمِ اللهِ (ثَلاثاً) وَقُلْ سَبْعَ مَرَّاتٍ: أَعُوذُ بِاللهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
adhkar.textEn: Place your hand on the part of your body that hurts and say: 'Bismillah' (three times), and say seven times: 'I seek refuge in Allah and His power from the evil of what I find and fear.'
adhkar.benefitAr: وضع اليد على موضع الألم والتعوذ
adhkar.benefitEn: Placing hand on the painful area and seeking refuge

adhkar.textAr: بارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ في الموهُوبِ لَكَ، وَشَكَـرْتَ الواهِبَ، وَبَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ، وَرُزِقْتَ بِرَّه
adhkar.textEn: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
adhkar.benefitAr: التهنئة بالمولود
adhkar.benefitEn: Congratulation for newborn

translations.ar: بارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ في الموهُوبِ لَكَ، وَشَكَـرْتَ الواهِبَ، وَبَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ، وَرُزِقْتَ بِرَّه
translations.en: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.fr: Louange à Allah qui nous a nourris, abreuvés, comblés et abrités. Combien sont ceux qui n'ont personne pour les combler ni les abriter.
translations.de: Lob sei Allah, der uns gespeist, getränkt, versorgt und beherbergt hat. Wie viele gibt es, die niemanden haben, der sie versorgt und beherbergt.
translations.es: Alabado sea Allah que nos alimentó, nos dio de beber, nos bastó y nos refugió. Cuántos hay que no tienen quien les baste ni les refugie.
translations.pt: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.pt-BR: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.it: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.nl: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.pl: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.ru: Хвала Аллаху, Который накормил нас, напоил, удовлетворил и приютил. Сколько тех, у кого нет ни того, кто удовлетворит, ни того, кто приютит.
translations.uk: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.tr: Allah'a hamdolsun ki bizi yedirdi, içirdi, ihtiyaçlarımızı karşıladı ve bize barınak verdi. Nice kimseler vardır ki onları koruyacak ve barındıracak kimseleri yoktur.
translations.id: Segala puji bagi Allah yang telah memberi kami makan, minum, mencukupi, dan melindungi kami. Berapa banyak orang yang tidak ada yang mencukupi dan melindunginya.
translations.ms: Segala puji bagi Allah yang telah memberi kami makan, minum, mencukupi, dan melindungi kami. Berapa ramai yang tiada siapa mencukupi dan melindunginya.
translations.bn: আলহামদুলিল্লাহ যিনি আমাদের খাওয়ালেন, পান করালেন, যথেষ্ট করলেন এবং আশ্রয় দিলেন। কত মানুষ আছে যাদের যথেষ্ট করার ও আশ্রয় দেওয়ার কেউ নেই।
translations.hi: अल्हम्दुलिल्लाह जिसने हमें खिलाया, पिलाया, काफी किया और ठिकाना दिया। कितने हैं जिनका न कोई काफी है न ठिकाना देने वाला।
translations.ur: الحمد للہ جس نے ہمیں کھلایا، پلایا، کفایت کی اور ٹھکانہ دیا۔ کتنے ہیں جن کا نہ کوئی کافی ہے نہ ٹھکانہ دینے والا۔
translations.fa: حمد خدایی که ما را خوراند، نوشاند، کفایت کرد و پناه داد. چه بسیار کسانی که نه کفایت‌کننده دارند نه پناه‌دهنده.
translations.ku: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.sw: Sifa zote ni za Allah aliyetulisha, kutunywesha, kututosha na kutupa makazi. Ni wangapi ambao hawana wa kuwatosha wala kuwapa makazi.
translations.ha: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.so: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.am: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.sq: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.bs: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.ro: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.el: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.th: อัลฮัมดุลิลลาฮ์ ผู้ทรงให้อาหาร เครื่องดื่ม ความพอเพียง และที่พักพิงแก่เรา มีคนมากมายที่ไม่มีใครให้ความพอเพียงและที่พักพิง
translations.vi: Alhamdulillah Đấng đã cho chúng tôi ăn, uống, đủ đầy và nơi trú ẩn. Biết bao người không có ai đủ đầy và che chở cho họ.
translations.tl: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.ja: 私たちに食べ物と飲み物を与え、満たし、避難所を与えてくださったアッラーを讃えます。満たしてくれる者も避難所を与えてくれる者もいない人がどれだけいることか。
translations.ko: 우리에게 먹이고, 마시게 하고, 충분히 하시고, 피난처를 주신 알라를 찬양합니다. 충분히 해주고 피난처를 줄 사람이 없는 이가 얼마나 많은가.
translations.zh-Hans: 赞颂安拉，他给我们饮食、满足我们、庇护我们。有多少人没有人满足他们、庇护他们。
translations.zh-Hant: 讚頌安拉，他給我們飲食、滿足我們、庇護我們。有多少人沒有人滿足他們、庇護他們。
translations.ps: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.uz: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.kk: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.az: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.fil: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
translations.jv: May Allah bless you with what He has given you, may you (the new parent) give thanks to the One Who bestowed, may the child reach maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِـ(فُلان) وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ فِي المَهْدِيِّينَ، وَاخْلُفْهُ فِي عَقِبِهِ فِي الغَابِرِينَ، وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَلَهُ يَا رَبَّ العَالَمِينَ، وَافْسَحْ لَهُ فِي قَبْرِهِ وَنَوِّرْ لَهُ فِيهِ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive (name) and elevate his rank among the rightly guided, and be a successor to whom he has left behind, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds, and expand his grave for him and illuminate it for him.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء عند إغماض عيني الميت
adhkar.benefitEn: Supplication when closing the eyes of the deceased

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ لَـكَ الحَـمْـدُ أنْـتَ كَسَـوْتَنيهِ، أَسْأَلُـكَ مِـنْ خَـيرِهِ وَخَـيْرِ ما صُنِعَ لَـه، وَأَعوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ شَـرِّهِ وَشَـرِّ ما صُنِعَ لَـه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it. I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.
adhkar.benefitAr: شكر الله على نعمة اللباس
adhkar.benefitEn: Gratitude to Allah for the blessing of clothing

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ لَـكَ الحَـمْـدُ أنْـتَ كَسَـوْتَنيهِ، أَسْأَلُـكَ مِـنْ خَـيرِهِ وَخَـيْرِ ما صُنِعَ لَـه، وَأَعوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ شَـرِّهِ وَشَـرِّ ما صُنِعَ لَـه
translations.en: O Allah, for You is all praise, You have clothed me with it. I ask You for the good of it and the good for which it was made, and I seek refuge with You from the evil of it and the evil for which it was made.

adhkar.textAr: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لِـ(فلان) وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَـهُ في المَهْـدِييـن ، وَاخْـلُفْـهُ في عَقِـبِهِ في الغابِـرين، وَاغْفِـرْ لَنـا وَلَـهُ يا رَبَّ العـالَمـين، وَافْسَـحْ لَهُ في قَبْـرِهِ وَنَـوِّرْ لَهُ فيه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive (name) and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave, and shed light upon him in it.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند إغماض عيني الميت
adhkar.benefitEn: When closing the eyes of the deceased

adhkar.textAr: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـه ، وَعافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْـه ، وَأَكْـرِمْ نُزُلَـه ، وَوَسِّـعْ مُدْخَـلَه ، وَاغْسِلْـهُ بِالْمـاءِ وَالثَّـلْجِ وَالْبَـرَدْ ، وَنَقِّـهِ مِنَ الْخطـايا كَما نَـقّيْتَ الـثَّوْبَ الأَبْيَـضَ مِنَ الدَّنَـسْ ، وَأَبْـدِلْهُ داراً خَـيْراً مِنْ دارِه ، وَأَهْلاً خَـيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِـه ، وَزَوْجَـاً خَـيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِه ، وَأَدْخِـلْهُ الْجَـنَّة ، وَأَعِـذْهُ مِنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر وَعَذابِ النّـار
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-fire.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء للميت في صلاة الجنازة
adhkar.benefitEn: Dua for deceased in funeral prayer

translations.ar: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـه ، وَعافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْـه ، وَأَكْـرِمْ نُزُلَـه ، وَوَسِّـعْ مُدْخَـلَه ، وَاغْسِلْـهُ بِالْمـاءِ وَالثَّـلْجِ وَالْبَـرَدْ ، وَنَقِّـهِ مِنَ الْخطـايا كَما نَـقّيْتَ الـثَّوْبَ الأَبْيَـضَ مِنَ الدَّنَـسْ ، وَأَبْـدِلْهُ داراً خَـيْراً مِنْ دارِه ، وَأَهْلاً خَـيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِـه ، وَزَوْجَـاً خَـيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِه ، وَأَدْخِـلْهُ الْجَـنَّة ، وَأَعِـذْهُ مِنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر وَعَذابِ النّـار
translations.en: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-fire.
translations.fr: Ô Allah, forgive him and have miséricorde on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradis, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-Feu.
translations.de: O Allah, forgive him and have Barmherzigkeit on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradies, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-Feuer.
translations.es: Oh Allah, forgive him and have misericordia on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paraíso, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-Fuego.
translations.pt: Ó Allah, forgive him and have misericórdia on him, and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him, and cause his entrance to be wide, and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family, and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paraíso, and protect him from the punishment of the grave and from the punishment of Hell-Fogo.

adhkar.textAr: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لِحَيِّـنا وَمَيِّتِـنا، وَشـاهِدِنا وَغائِبِـنا ، وَصَغيـرِنا وَكَبيـرِنا ، وَذَكَـرِنا وَأُنْثـانا . اللهُـمِّ مَنْ أَحْيَيْـتَهُ مِنّا فَأَحْيِـهِ عَلى الإِسْلام ، وَمَنْ تَوَفَّـيْتَهُ مِنّا فَتَوَفَّـهُ عَلى الإِيـمان ، اللهُـمِّ لا تَحْـرِمْنـا أَجْـرَه ، وَلا تُضِـلَّنا بَعْـدَه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah forgive our living and our dead, those with us and those absent, our young and our old, our menfolk and our womenfolk. O Allah, whomever you give life from among us give him life in Islam, and whomever you take away from us take him away in Faith. O Allah, do not forbid us their reward and do not send us astray after them.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء للميت في صلاة الجنازة
adhkar.benefitEn: Dua for deceased in funeral prayer

Ya Allah, do not forbid us their reward and do not send us astray after them.

adhkar.textAr: اللهُـمِّ إِنَّ فُلانَ بْنَ فُلانٍ في ذِمَّـتِك ، وَحَبْـلِ جِـوارِك ، فَقِـهِ مِنْ فِتْـنَةِ الْقَـبْرِ وَعَذابِ النّـار ، وَأَنْتَ أَهْلُ الْوَفـاءِ وَالْـحَقِّ ، فَاغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـهُ ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الغَـفورُ الـرَّحيم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, surely (name) is under Your protection, so save him from the trial of the grave and from the punishment of the Fire. You fulfill promises and grant rights, so forgive him and have mercy on him. Surely You are Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء للميت في صلاة الجنازة
adhkar.benefitEn: Dua for deceased in funeral prayer

translations.ar: اللهُـمِّ إِنَّ فُلانَ بْنَ فُلانٍ في ذِمَّـتِك ، وَحَبْـلِ جِـوارِك ، فَقِـهِ مِنْ فِتْـنَةِ الْقَـبْرِ وَعَذابِ النّـار ، وَأَنْتَ أَهْلُ الْوَفـاءِ وَالْـحَقِّ ، فَاغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـهُ ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الغَـفورُ الـرَّحيم

adhkar.textAr: اللهُـمِّ عَبْـدُكَ وَابْنُ أَمَـتِك، احْتـاجَ إِلى رَحْمَـتِك، وَأَنْتَ غَنِـيٌّ عَنْ عَذابِـه، إِنْ كانَ مُحْـسِناً فَزِدْ في حَسَـناتِه، وَإِنْ كانَ مُسـيئاً فَتَـجاوَزْ عَنْـه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Your male slave and the child of Your female slave is in need of Your mercy, and You are not in need of his torment. If he was pious then increase his rewards and if he was a transgressor then pardon him.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء للميت في صلاة الجنازة
adhkar.benefitEn: Dua for deceased in funeral prayer

translations.ar: اللهُـمِّ عَبْـدُكَ وَابْنُ أَمَـتِك، احْتـاجَ إِلى رَحْمَـتِك، وَأَنْتَ غَنِـيٌّ عَنْ عَذابِـه، إِنْ كانَ مُحْـسِناً فَزِدْ في حَسَـناتِه، وَإِنْ كانَ مُسـيئاً فَتَـجاوَزْ عَنْـه

adhkar.textAr: اللهم اجعله فرطاً وذخراً لوالديه ، وشفيعاً مجاباً . اللهم ثقل به موازينهما وأعظم به أجورهما ، وألحقهُ بصالح المؤمنين ، واجعلهُ في كفالة إبراهيم ، وقه برحمتك عذاب الجحيم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, make him a precursor and treasure for his parents and an answered intercessor. O Allah, make him weigh heavily in their scales and magnify their reward. Make him join the righteous believers. Place him in Ibrahim's care. Save him by Your mercy from Hell's torment.
adhkar.benefitAr: الدعاء للطفل في صلاة الجنازة
adhkar.benefitEn: Dua for deceased child in funeral prayer

translations.ar: اللهم اجعله فرطاً وذخراً لوالديه ، وشفيعاً مجاباً . اللهم ثقل به موازينهما وأعظم به أجورهما ، وألحقهُ بصالح المؤمنين ، واجعلهُ في كفالة إبراهيم ، وقه برحمتك عذاب الجحيم

translations.fr: Ô Allah, make him a precursor and treasure for his parents and an answered intercessor. Ô Allah, make him weigh heavily in their scales and magnify their reward. Make him join the righteous believers. Place him in Ibrahim's care. Save him by Your miséricorde from Hell's torment.

adhkar.textAr: إن لله ما أخذ وله ما أعطى . وكل شيء عنده بأجل مُسمى ... فلتصبر ولتحتسب
adhkar.textEn: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
adhkar.benefitAr: التعزية لأهل الميت
adhkar.benefitEn: Condolence to the bereaved

translations.ar: إن لله ما أخذ وله ما أعطى . وكل شيء عنده بأجل مُسمى ... فلتصبر ولتحتسب
translations.en: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.fr: Certes, ce qu'Allah prend Lui appartient, et ce qu'Il donne Lui appartient, et toute chose a un terme fixé... alors patiente et espère la récompense.
translations.de: Wahrlich, was Allah nimmt, gehört Ihm, und was Er gibt, gehört Ihm, und für alles hat Er eine Zeit bestimmt... also sei geduldig und hoffe auf Belohnung.
translations.es: Ciertamente, lo que Allah toma es Suyo, y lo que da es Suyo, y todo tiene un tiempo señalado... así que ten paciencia y espera la recompensa.
translations.pt: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.pt-BR: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.it: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.nl: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.pl: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ru: Воистину, то, что Аллах забирает — Его, и то, что даёт — Его, и для всего Он назначил срок... так терпи и надейся на награду.
translations.uk: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.tr: Şüphesiz Allah'ın aldığı da O'nundur, verdiği de O'nundur ve her şeyin O'nun katında belirli bir vakti vardır... sabret ve sevap kazan.
translations.id: Sesungguhnya apa yang diambil Allah adalah milik-Nya, dan apa yang diberikan adalah milik-Nya, dan segala sesuatu memiliki waktu yang ditentukan... maka bersabarlah dan berharaplah pahala.
translations.ms: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.bn: নিশ্চয়ই আল্লাহ যা নেন তা তাঁর, এবং যা দেন তা তাঁর, এবং প্রতিটি জিনিসের নির্ধারিত সময় আছে... তাই ধৈর্য ধরো এবং প্রতিদান আশা করো।
translations.hi: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ur: بے شک جو اللہ لیتا ہے وہ اسی کا ہے، اور جو دیتا ہے وہ اسی کا ہے، اور ہر چیز کا وقت مقرر ہے... پس صبر کرو اور ثواب کی امید رکھو۔
translations.fa: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ku: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.sw: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ha: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.so: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.am: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.sq: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.bs: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ro: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.el: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.th: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.vi: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.tl: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time... so have patience and be rewarded.
translations.ja: 確かにアッラーが取るものは彼のもの、与えるものも彼のもの、全てに定められた時がある…だから忍耐し報酬を得よ。
translations.ko: 확실히 알라께서 가져가시는 것은 그분의 것이고, 주시는 것도 그분의 것이며, 모든 것에 정해진 때가 있습니다... 그러니 인내하고 보상을 기대하십시오.
translations.zh-Hans: 确实，安拉所取的是他的，所给的也是他的，一切都有定时...所以要忍耐并期待回报。
translations.zh-Hant: 確實，安拉所取的是他的，所給的也是他的，一切都有定時...所以要忍耐並期待回報。

adhkar.textAr: أعظم الله أجرك ، وأحسن عزاءك وغفر لميتك
adhkar.textEn: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
adhkar.benefitAr: التعزية لأهل الميت
adhkar.benefitEn: Condolence to the bereaved

translations.ar: أعظم الله أجرك ، وأحسن عزاءك وغفر لميتك
translations.en: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.fr: Qu'Allah multiplie ta récompense, parfasse ton deuil, et pardonne à ton défunt.
translations.de: Möge Allah deine Belohnung vergrößern, deine Trauer vervollkommnen und deinem Verstorbenen vergeben.
translations.es: Que Allah aumente tu recompensa, perfeccione tu duelo, y perdone a tu difunto.
translations.pt: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.pt-BR: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.it: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.nl: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.pl: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.ru: Да увеличит Аллах твою награду, да совершенствует твоё терпение и да простит твоего усопшего.
translations.uk: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.tr: Allah ecrini artırsın, sabrını güzelleştirsin ve merhumu bağışlasın.
translations.id: Semoga Allah melipatgandakan pahalamu, menyempurnakan kesabaranmu, dan mengampuni almarhum.
translations.ms: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.bn: আল্লাহ তোমার প্রতিদান বাড়িয়ে দিন, তোমার শোককে পূর্ণ করুন এবং মৃতকে ক্ষমা করুন।
translations.hi: May Allah magnify your reward, and make perfect your bereavement, and forgive your departed.
translations.ur: اللہ تمہارا اجر بڑھائے، تمہارے صبر کو کامل کرے، اور مرحوم کو بخشے۔

translations.ja: アッラーがあなたの報酬を増やし、喪を全うさせ、故人を赦しますように。
translations.ko: 알라께서 당신의 보상을 늘리시고, 애도를 완성시키시고, 고인을 용서하시기를.
translations.zh-Hans: 愿安拉增加你的回报，完善你的哀悼，并宽恕你的亡者。
translations.zh-Hant: 願安拉增加你的回報，完善你的哀悼，並寬恕你的亡者。

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيم، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ رَبُّ العَرْشِ العَظِيم، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ رَبُّ السَّمَوَاتِ، وَرَبُّ الأَرْضِ، وَرَبُّ العَرْشِ الكَرِيم
adhkar.textEn: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
adhkar.benefitAr: من أعظم أدعية الكرب والهم
adhkar.benefitEn: One of the greatest supplications for distress and anxiety

translations.ar: لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ الْعَظِيمُ الْحَلِيم، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ رَبُّ العَرْشِ العَظِيم، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ رَبُّ السَّمَوَاتِ، وَرَبُّ الأَرْضِ، وَرَبُّ العَرْشِ الكَرِيم

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ رَحْمَتَـكَ أَرْجـو فَلا تَكِلْـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـيْن، وَأَصْلِـحْ لي شَـأْنـي كُلَّـه، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ أَنْـت
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye. Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: طلب الرحمة من الله وعدم الوكول إلى النفس
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking mercy from Allah and not being left to oneself

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ رَحْمَتَـكَ أَرْجـو فَلا تَكِلْـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـيْن، وَأَصْلِـحْ لي شَـأْنـي كُلَّـه، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ أَنْـت

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي عَبْـدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْـدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِـكَ، نَاصِيَتِي بِيَـدِكَ، مَاضٍ فِيَّ حُكْمُكَ، عَدْلٌ فِيَّ قَضَاؤُكَ، أَسْأَلُـكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ هُوَ لَكَ، سَمَّيْـتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، أَوْ أَنْزَلْتَـهُ فِي كِتَابِكَ، أَوْ عَلَّمْتَـهُ أَحَداً مِنْ خَلْقِـكَ، أَوِ اسْتَأْثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ الغَيْبِ عِنْـدَكَ، أَنْ تَجْـعَلَ القُرْآنَ رَبِيـعَ قَلْبِـي، وَنورَ صَـدْرِي، وَجَلاءَ حُزْنِـي، وَذَهَابَ هَمِّـي
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I am Your slave, the son of Your male slave, and the son of Your female slave. My forelock is in Your Hand. Your judgment upon me is assured, and Your decree concerning me is just. I ask You by every name that You have named Yourself with, revealed in Your Book, taught to any of Your creation, or kept exclusively in the knowledge of the unseen with You, that You make the Quran the spring of my heart, and the light of my chest, the banisher of my sadness, and the reliever of my distress.
adhkar.benefitAr: يُذهب الله همه ويُبدله مكانه فرجاً
adhkar.benefitEn: Allah will remove his sorrow and replace it with joy

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي عَبْـدُكَ، ابْنُ عَبْـدِكَ، ابْنُ أَمَتِـكَ، نَاصِيَتِي بِيَـدِكَ، مَاضٍ فِيَّ حُكْمُكَ، عَدْلٌ فِيَّ قَضَاؤُكَ، أَسْأَلُـكَ بِكُلِّ اسْمٍ هُوَ لَكَ، سَمَّيْـتَ بِهِ نَفْسَكَ، أَوْ أَنْزَلْتَـهُ فِي كِتَابِكَ، أَوْ عَلَّمْتَـهُ أَحَداً مِنْ خَلْقِـكَ، أَوِ اسْتَأْثَرْتَ بِهِ فِي عِلْمِ الغَيْبِ عِنْـدَكَ، أَنْ تَجْـعَلَ القُرْآنَ رَبِيـعَ قَلْبِـي، وَنورَ صَـدْرِي، وَجَلاءَ حُزْنِـي، وَذَهَابَ هَمِّـي
translations.en: O Allah, I am Your slave, the son of Your male slave, and the son of Your female slave. My forelock is in Your Hand. Your judgment upon me is assured, and Your decree concerning me is just. I ask You by every name that You have named Yourself with, revealed in Your Book, taught to any of Your creation, or kept exclusively in the knowledge of the unseen with You, that You make the Quran the spring of my heart, and the light of my chest, the banisher of my sadness, and the reliever of my distress.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَـمِّ وَالْحَـزَنِ، وَالعَجْـزِ وَالكَسَلِ، وَالبُخْـلِ وَالجُـبْنِ، وَضَلَـعِ الدَّيْـنِ وَغَلَبَـةِ الرِّجال
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from incapacity and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, from being heavily in debt and from being overpowered by other men.
adhkar.benefitAr: الاستعاذة من الهم والحزن والعجز والكسل والبخل والجبن وضلع الدين وغلبة الرجال
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking refuge from worry, grief, weakness, laziness, miserliness, cowardice, debt, and being overpowered

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَـمِّ وَالْحَـزَنِ، وَالعَجْـزِ وَالكَسَلِ، وَالبُخْـلِ وَالجُـبْنِ، وَضَلَـعِ الدَّيْـنِ وَغَلَبَـةِ الرِّجال

adhkar.textAr: أَعوذُ بِاللهِ العَظيـم، وَبِوَجْهِـهِ الكَرِيـم، وَسُلْطـانِه القَديـم، مِنَ الشَّيْـطانِ الرَّجـيم، بِسْـمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلاةُ وَالسَّلامُ عَلى رَسولِ الله، اللّهُـمَّ افْتَـحْ لي أَبْوابَ رَحْمَتـِك
adhkar.textEn: I seek refuge in Almighty Allah, by His Noble Face, by His primordial power, from Satan the outcast. In the Name of Allah, and blessings and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open before me the doors of Your mercy.

reference.book: Abu Dawud 1/126, Al-Albani Sahih Ibn Majah 1/128-129

adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها فُتحت له أبواب الرحمة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this, the gates of mercy are opened for him

translations.ar: أَعوذُ بِاللهِ العَظيـم، وَبِوَجْهِـهِ الكَرِيـم، وَسُلْطـانِه القَديـم، مِنَ الشَّيْـطانِ الرَّجـيم، بِسْـمِ اللهِ، وَالصَّلاةُ وَالسَّلامُ عَلى رَسولِ الله، اللّهُـمَّ افْتَـحْ لي أَبْوابَ رَحْمَتـِك
translations.en: I seek refuge in Almighty Allah, by His Noble Face, by His primordial power, from Satan the outcast. In the Name of Allah, and blessings and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open before me the doors of Your mercy.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَظْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الأَرَضِينَ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَقْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَمَا أَضْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الرِّيَاحِ وَمَا ذَرَيْنَ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذِهِ القَرْيَةِ وَخَيْرَ أَهْلِهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ أَهْلِهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens and all that they shade, Lord of the seven earths and all that they carry, Lord of the devils and all that they mislead, Lord of the winds and all that they scatter. I ask You for the goodness of this town and the goodness of its people and the goodness of what is in it, and I seek refuge in You from its evil and the evil of its people and the evil of what is in it.
adhkar.benefitAr: طلب الخير والحماية عند دخول مدينة أو قرية
adhkar.benefitEn: Asking for good and protection when entering a town

translations.ar: اللّهُمَّ رَبَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَظْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الأَرَضِينَ السَّبْعِ وَمَا أَقْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الشَّيَاطِينِ وَمَا أَضْلَلْنَ، وَرَبَّ الرِّيَاحِ وَمَا ذَرَيْنَ، أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذِهِ القَرْيَةِ وَخَيْرَ أَهْلِهَا وَخَيْرَ مَا فِيهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهَا وَشَرِّ أَهْلِهَا وَشَرِّ مَا فِيهَا

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ (٢٥٥)
adhkar.textEn: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قرأها حين يُمسي أُجير من الجن حتى يُصبح
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever recites this in the evening will be protected from jinn until morning

translations.ar:

ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ (١) ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ (٢) لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ (٣) وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ (٤)
adhkar.textEn: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
adhkar.benefitAr: قراءتها ثلاث مرات صباحاً ومساءً تكفي من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Reading it three times morning and evening suffices from everything

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ۝ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ ۝ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ ۝ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
translations.en: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.fr: Dis: Il est Allah, l'Unique. Allah, le Seul à être imploré. Il n'a jamais engendré, n'a pas été engendré. Et nul n'est égal à Lui.
translations.de: Sprich: Er ist Allah, ein Einziger. Allah, der Absolute. Er zeugt nicht und ward nicht gezeugt. Und keiner ist Ihm gleich.
translations.es: Di: Él es Allah, el Único. Allah, el Absoluto. No engendró ni fue engendrado. Y no hay nadie igual a Él.
translations.pt: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.pt-BR: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.it: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.nl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.pl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.ru: Скажи: Он — Аллах Единый. Аллах Самодостаточный. Он не родил и не был рождён. И нет никого, равного Ему.
translations.uk: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.tr: De ki: O Allah'tır, birdir. Allah Samed'dir. O doğurmamış ve doğmamıştır. Hiçbir şey O'na denk değildir.
translations.id: Katakanlah: Dia-lah Allah, Yang Maha Esa. Allah adalah tempat bergantung segala sesuatu. Dia tidak beranak dan tidak pula diperanakkan. Dan tidak ada seorang pun yang setara dengan-Nya.
translations.ms: Katakanlah: Dia-lah Allah, Yang Maha Esa. Allah tempat bergantung. Dia tidak beranak dan tidak pula diperanakkan. Dan tidak ada seorang pun yang setara dengan-Nya.
translations.bn: বলুন: তিনি আল্লাহ, এক। আল্লাহ অমুখাপেক্ষী। তিনি কাউকে জন্ম দেননি এবং কেউ তাঁকে জন্ম দেয়নি। তাঁর সমতুল্য কেউ নেই।
translations.hi: कहो: वह अल्लाह है, एक। अल्लाह बेनियाज़ है। न उसने जना न वह जना गया। और कोई उसके बराबर नहीं।
translations.ur: کہو: وہ اللہ ہے، ایک ہے۔ اللہ بے نیاز ہے۔ نہ اس سے کوئی پیدا ہوا نہ وہ کسی سے پیدا ہوا۔ اور کوئی اس کا ہمسر نہیں۔
translations.fa: بگو: او خدای یکتاست. خدای بی‌نیاز. نه زاده و نه زاده شده. و هیچ‌کس همتای او نیست.
translations.ku: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.sw: Sema: Yeye ni Allah, Mmoja. Allah, Mkamilifu. Hakuzaa wala hakuzaliwa. Na hakuna yeyote anayefanana naye.
translations.ha: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.so: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.

translations.el: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.th: จงกล่าวเถิด: พระองค์คืออัลลอฮ์ ผู้ทรงเอกะ อัลลอฮ์ทรงเป็นที่พึ่ง พระองค์ไม่ประสูติและไม่ถูกประสูติ และไม่มีผู้ใดเสมอเหมือนพระองค์
translations.vi: Hãy nói: Ngài là Allah, Đấng Duy Nhất. Allah, Đấng Tự Tại. Ngài không sinh ra và cũng không được sinh ra. Và không có ai sánh bằng Ngài.
translations.tl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.ja: 言え：彼はアッラー、唯一の方。アッラー、永遠なる方。彼は生まず、生まれず。彼に比べられる者は何もない。
translations.ko: 말하라: 그분은 알라이시니 유일하신 분. 알라는 자족하시는 분. 낳지도 않으셨고 나지도 않으셨으며. 그분과 동등한 것은 아무것도 없노라.
translations.zh-Hans: 你说：他是安拉，是独一的主。安拉是万物所仰赖的。他没有生产，也没有被生产。没有任何物可以做他的匹敌。
translations.zh-Hant: 你說：他是安拉，是獨一的主。安拉是萬物所仰賴的。他沒有生產，也沒有被生產。沒有任何物可以做他的匹敵。

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ (١) مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ (٢) وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ (٣) وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ (٤) وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ (٥)
adhkar.textEn: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the daybreak. From the evil of what He has created. And from the evil of the darkening as it comes with its darkness. And from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots. And from the evil of the envier when he envies.
adhkar.benefitAr: قراءتها ثلاث مرات صباحاً ومساءً تكفي من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Reading it three times morning and evening suffices from everything

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ ۝ مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ (١) مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٢) إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٣) مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ (٤) ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٥) مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ (٦)
adhkar.textEn: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind. The King of mankind. The God of mankind. From the evil of the retreating whisperer. Who whispers in the breasts of mankind. Of jinn and men.
adhkar.benefitAr: قراءتها ثلاث مرات صباحاً ومساءً تكفي من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Reading it three times morning and evening suffices from everything

adhkar.textAr: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَخَيرَ مَا بَعْدَهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهَا، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
adhkar.textEn: We have entered a new evening and with it all dominion belongs to Allah. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He has power over all things. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what comes after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what comes after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the punishment of the grave.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها حين يمسي أدى شكر ليلته
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this in the evening has fulfilled the gratitude of his night

translations.ar: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَخَيرَ مَا بَعْدَهَا، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهَا، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
translations.en: We have entered a new evening and with it all dominion belongs to Allah. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He has power over all things. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what comes after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what comes after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the punishment of the grave.
translations.fr: We have entered a new evening and with it all dominion belongs tÔ Allah. Louange à Allah. None has the right to be adorationped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, and to Him is the louange and He has power over all things. Mon Seigneur, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what comes after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what comes after it. Mon Seigneur, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. Mon Seigneur, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Feu and the punishment of the grave.

Mein Herr, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what comes after it, and I seek Zuflucht in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what comes after it. Mein Herr, I seek Zuflucht in You from laziness and helpless old age. Mein Herr, I seek Zuflucht in You from the punishment of the Feuer and the punishment of the grave.

Tuhanku, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what comes after it, and I seek perlindungan in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what comes after it. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَـينا، وَبِكَ أَصْـبَحْنا، وَبِكَ نَحْـيا، وَبِكَ نَمُـوتُ وَإِلَـيْكَ الْمَصيـر
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها حين يصبح ويمسي كفته من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this morning and evening, it will suffice him from everything

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَـينا، وَبِكَ أَصْـبَحْنا، وَبِكَ نَحْـيا، وَبِكَ نَمُـوتُ وَإِلَـيْكَ الْمَصيـر

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إِلَـهَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنـي وَأَنا عَبْـدُك، وَأَنا عَلـى عَهْـدِكَ وَوَعْـدِكَ ما اسْتَـطَعْـت، أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما صَنَـعْت، أَبـوءُ لَـكَ بِنِعْـمَتِـكَ عَلَـيَّ، وَأَبـوءُ بِذَنْـبي فَاغْفـِرْ لي فَإِنَّـهُ لا يَغْـفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship but You. You created me and I am Your slave. I keep Your covenant, and my pledge to You so far as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your blessings upon me, and I acknowledge my sins. Forgive me, for there is none who may forgive sins but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها موقناً بها حين يُمسي فمات من ليلته دخل الجنة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says it with conviction in the evening and dies that night will enter Paradise

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إِلَـهَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنـي وَأَنا عَبْـدُك، وَأَنا عَلـى عَهْـدِكَ وَوَعْـدِكَ ما اسْتَـطَعْـت، أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما صَنَـعْت، أَبـوءُ لَـكَ بِنِعْـمَتِـكَ عَلَـيَّ، وَأَبـوءُ بِذَنْـبي فَاغْفـِرْ لي فَإِنَّـهُ لا يَغْـفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَمْسَـيتُ أُشْـهِدُك، وَأُشْـهِدُ حَمَلَـةَ عَـرْشِـك، وَمَلائِكَتِك، وَجَمـيعَ خَلْـقِك، أَنَّـكَ أَنْتَ اللهُ لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْـتَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، وَأَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُكَ وَرَسـولُـك
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I have entered a new evening and I call upon You and upon the bearers of Your Throne, upon Your angels and all creation to bear witness that surely You are Allah. There is none worthy of worship but You alone, You have no partners, and that Muhammad is Your slave and Your Messenger.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها أربع مرات أعتقه الله من النار
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this four times, Allah will free him from the Fire

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ ما أَمْسـى بي مِـنْ نِعْـمَةٍ أَو بِأَحَـدٍ مِـنْ خَلْـقِك، فَمِـنْكَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، فَلَـكَ الْحَمْـدُ وَلَـكَ الشُّكْـر
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation have come upon this evening, is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها فقد أدى شكر يومه
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this has fulfilled the gratitude of his day

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَدَنـي، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في سَمْـعي، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَصَـري، لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْـتَ

adhkar.textAr: حَسْبِـيَ اللّهُ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ هُوَ عَلَـيهِ تَوَكَّـلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظـيم
adhkar.textEn: Allah is sufficient for me. There is none worthy of worship but Him. I have placed my trust in Him, He is Lord of the Majestic Throne.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها سبع مرات كفاه الله ما أهمه من أمر الدنيا والآخرة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this seven times, Allah will suffice him from whatever concerns him of this world and the Hereafter

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في الدُّنْـيا وَالآخِـرَة، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في ديني وَدُنْـيايَ وَأَهْـلي وَمالـي، اللّهُـمَّ اسْتُـرْ عَوْراتي وَآمِـنْ رَوْعاتـي، اللّهُـمَّ احْفَظْـني مِن بَـينِ يَدَيَّ وَمِن خَلْفـي وَعَن يَمـيني وَعَن شِمـالي، وَمِن فَوْقـي، وَأَعـوذُ بِعَظَمَـتِكَ أَن أُغْـتالَ مِن تَحْتـي
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish. O Allah, guard me from what is in front of me and behind me, from my left, and from my right, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.
adhkar.benefitAr: من أعظم أدعية طلب العفو والعافية
adhkar.benefitEn: One of the greatest supplications for seeking pardon and wellbeing

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في الدُّنْـيا وَالآخِـرَة، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في ديني وَدُنْـيايَ وَأَهْـلي وَمالـي، اللّهُـمَّ اسْتُـرْ عَوْراتي وَآمِـنْ رَوْعاتـي، اللّهُـمَّ احْفَظْـني مِن بَـينِ يَدَيَّ وَمِن خَلْفـي وَعَن يَمـيني وَعَن شِمـالي، وَمِن فَوْقـي، وَأَعـوذُ بِعَظَمَـتِكَ أَن أُغْـتالَ مِن تَحْتـي
translations.en: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish. O Allah, guard me from what is in front of me and behind me, from my left, and from my right, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.
translations.fr: Ô Allah, I seek Your pardon and Your protection in this world and the next. Ô Allah, I seek Your pardon and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. Ô Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish. Ô Allah, guard me from what is in front of me and behind me, from my left, and from my right, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.
translations.de: O Allah, I seek Your Vergebung and Your protection in this world and the next. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ عالِـمَ الغَـيْبِ وَالشّـهادَةِ فاطِـرَ السّماواتِ وَالأرْضِ رَبَّ كـلِّ شَيءٍ وَمَليـكَه، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْت، أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِن شَـرِّ نَفْسـي وَمِن شَـرِّ الشَّيْـطانِ وَشِـرْكِه، وَأَنْ أَقْتَـرِفَ عَلـى نَفْسـي سوءاً أَوْ أَجُـرَّهُ إِلـى مُسْـلِم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his shirk, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
adhkar.benefitAr: الاستعاذة من شر النفس والشيطان
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking refuge from the evil of oneself and Satan

adhkar.textAr: بِسـمِ اللهِ الذي لا يَضُـرُّ مَعَ اسمِـهِ شَيءٌ في الأرْضِ وَلا في السّمـاءِ وَهـوَ السّمـيعُ العَلـيم
adhkar.textEn: In the Name of Allah, with Whose Name nothing on the earth or in the heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها ثلاثاً لم يضره شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this three times, nothing will harm him

adhkar.textAr: رَضيـتُ بِاللهِ رَبَّـاً وَبِالإسْلامِ ديـناً وَبِمُحَـمَّدٍ صلى الله عليه وسلم نَبِيّـاً
adhkar.textEn: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion and with Muhammad as my Prophet.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها ثلاثاً حين يصبح وحين يمسي كان حقاً على الله أن يرضيه يوم القيامة

adhkar.textAr: يا حَـيُّ يا قَيّـومُ بِـرَحْمَـتِكِ أَسْتَـغـيث، أَصْلِـحْ لي شَـأْنـي كُلَّـه، وَلا تَكِلْـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـين
adhkar.textEn: O Ever Living One, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your Mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها أصلح الله له شأنه كله
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this, Allah will rectify all his affairs

adhkar.textAr: أَمْسَـينا عَلى فِطْرَةِ الإسْلام، وَعَلى كَلِمَةِ الإخْـلاص، وَعَلى دينِ نَبِـيِّنا مُحَمَّدٍ صَلّى اللهُ عَلَيْهِ وَسَلَّم، وَعَلى مِلَّةِ أَبينا إِبْـراهيمَ حَنيفاً مُسْلِماً وَمـا كانَ مِنَ الْمُشْـرِكين
adhkar.textEn: We end this day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright, a Muslim, and he was not of those who worship others besides Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: الإمساء على فطرة الإسلام وكلمة الإخلاص
adhkar.benefitEn: Ending the day upon the natural way of Islam and the word of sincerity

adhkar.textAr: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها مائة مرة كانت له عدل عشر رقاب، وكتبت له مائة حسنة، ومحيت عنه مائة سيئة، وكانت له حرزاً من الشيطان
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this 100 times, it will be as if he freed 10 slaves, 100 good deeds will be written for him, 100 sins erased, and it will be a protection from Satan

adhkar.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
adhkar.textEn: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

adhkar.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Laa ilaaha ill-Allaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
adhkar.benefitAr: كمن أعتق عشر رقاب، وكُتب له مائة حسنة، ومُحيت عنه مائة سيئة، وكانت له حرزاً من الشيطان حتى يُصبح
adhkar.benefitEn: Like freeing 10 slaves, 100 good deeds written, 100 sins erased, protected from Satan until morning

adhkar.textAr: أَمْسَيْتُ أُثْنِي عَلَيْكَ حَمْدًا، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ
adhkar.textEn: I have reached the evening praising You, and I bear witness that there is no god but Allah.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Amsaytu uthni 'alayka hamdan, wa ash-hadu an laa ilaaha ill-Allah

reference.book: An-Nasa'i Al-Kubra (10406), Amal Al-Yawm wal-Laylah by Ibn As-Sunni (571)

adhkar.benefitAr: ثناء على الله وشهادة التوحيد في آخر اليوم

adhkar.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from helplessness and laziness, from cowardice and stinginess, from the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal
adhkar.benefitAr: كان النبي ﷺ كثيرًا ما يقول هذا الدعاء، يتعوذ من ثمانية أشياء تُعيق العبد عن الخير
adhkar.benefitEn: The Prophet (peace be upon him) frequently made this supplication, seeking refuge from eight things that hinder a person from doing good

translations.ar: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ

adhkar.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala aali Muhammad

adhkar.benefitAr: من صلى عليَّ حين يُصبح عشرًا وحين يُمسي عشرًا أدركته شفاعتي يوم القيامة
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever sends blessings upon me 10 times in the morning and 10 times in the evening, my intercession will reach him on the Day of Resurrection

adhkar.benefitAr: كان النبي ﷺ يستغفر في اليوم مائة مرة
adhkar.benefitEn: The Prophet used to seek forgiveness 100 times a day

adhkar.textAr: ذَهَـبَ الظَّمَـأُ، وَابْتَلَّـتِ العُـروق، وَثَبَـتَ الأَجْـرُ إِنْ شـاءَ الله
adhkar.textEn: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند الإفطار
adhkar.benefitEn: When breaking fast

translations.ar: ذَهَـبَ الظَّمَـأُ، وَابْتَلَّـتِ العُـروق، وَثَبَـتَ الأَجْـرُ إِنْ شـاءَ الله
translations.en: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.fr: La soif est partie, les veines sont hydratées, et la récompense est confirmée, si Allah le veut.
translations.de: Der Durst ist gestillt, die Adern sind befeuchtet, und die Belohnung ist bestätigt, so Allah will.
translations.es: La sed se ha ido, las venas están hidratadas, y la recompensa está confirmada, si Allah quiere.
translations.pt: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.pt-BR: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.it: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.nl: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.pl: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.ru: Жажда ушла, вены утолены, и награда подтверждена, если пожелает Аллах.
translations.uk: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.tr: Susuzluk gitti, damarlar sulandı ve sevap kesinleşti, inşallah.
translations.id: Dahaga telah hilang, urat-urat telah basah, dan pahala telah ditetapkan, insya Allah.
translations.ms: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.bn: তৃষ্ণা চলে গেছে, শিরাগুলো সিক্ত হয়েছে, এবং পুরস্কার নিশ্চিত হয়েছে, ইনশাআল্লাহ।
translations.hi: The thirst is gone, the veins are quenched, and the reward is confirmed, if Allah wills.
translations.ur: پیاس بجھ گئی، رگیں تر ہو گئیں، اور ثواب پکا ہو گیا، ان شاء اللہ۔

adhkar.textAr: حَسْبُنا اللهُ وَنِعْمَ الوَكِيل
adhkar.textEn: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs.
adhkar.benefitAr: حسبنا الله ونعم الوكيل قالها إبراهيم حين ألقي في النار، ومحمد ﷺ حين قالوا إن الناس قد جمعوا لكم
adhkar.benefitEn: Ibrahim said this when thrown into the fire, and Muhammad ﷺ when told that people had gathered against them

translations.ar: حَسْبُنا اللهُ وَنِعْمَ الوَكِيل
translations.en: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the Best Disposer of affairs.
translations.fr: Allah nous suffit et Il est le Meilleur Garant.
translations.de: Allah genügt uns, und Er ist der beste Sachwalter.
translations.es: Allah nos basta y Él es el Mejor Protector.

adhkar.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ ربَّ السَّمَوَاتِ السَّبْعِ، وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، كُنْ لِي جَاراً مِنْ فُلاَنِ بْنِ فُلاَنٍ، وَأَحْزَابِهِ مِنْ خَلاَئِقِكَ، أَنْ يَفْرُطَ عَلَيَّ أَحَدٌ مِنْهُمْ أَوْ يَطْغَى، عَزَّ جَارُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَنَاؤُكَ، وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, be for me a support against (such and such a person) and his helpers from among your creatures, lest any of them abuse me or do me wrong. Mighty is Your patronage, and glorious are Your praises. There is none worthy of worship but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء الحماية من الظلم
adhkar.benefitEn: Prayer for protection from oppression

translations.ar: اللَّهُمَّ ربَّ السَّمَوَاتِ السَّبْعِ، وَرَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، كُنْ لِي جَاراً مِنْ فُلاَنِ بْنِ فُلاَنٍ، وَأَحْزَابِهِ مِنْ خَلاَئِقِكَ، أَنْ يَفْرُطَ عَلَيَّ أَحَدٌ مِنْهُمْ أَوْ يَطْغَى، عَزَّ جَارُكَ، وَجَلَّ ثَنَاؤُكَ، وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of the seven heavens, Lord of the Magnificent Throne, be for me a support against (such and such a person) and his helpers from among your creatures, lest any of them abuse me or do me wrong. adhkar.textAr: الله أكبر، الله أعز من خلقه جميعاً ، الله أعز مما أخاف وأحذر ، أعوذ بالله الذي لا إله إلا هو ، الممسك السموات السبع أن يقعن على الأرض إلا بإذنه ، من شر عبدك فلان ، وجنوده وأتباعه وأشياعه ، من الجن والأنس ، اللهم كن لي جاراً من شرهم ، جل ثناؤك وعز جارك ، وتبارك اسمك ، ولا إله غيرك
adhkar.textEn: Allah is the Most Great, Mightier than all His creation. He is Mightier than what I fear and dread. I seek refuge in Allah, Who there is none worthy of worship but Him. He is the One Who holds the seven heavens from falling upon the earth except by His command. (I seek refuge in You Allah) from the evil of Your slave (name of the person), and his helpers, his followers, and his supporters from among the jinn and mankind. O Allah, be my support against their evil. Glorious are Your praises and mighty is Your patronage. Blessed is Your Name, there is no true God but You.

adhkar.textEn: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him.

adhkar.textEn: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him. I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to Him.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال عند القيام من المجلس

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ اغْفِـرْ لي ما قَدَّمْتُ وَما أَخَّرْت، وَما أَسْرَرْتُ وَما أَعْلَنْت، وَما أَسْرَفْت، وَما أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي، أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّر، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْت
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have made public, what I have been excessive in, and what You know better than I. You are the Advancer and the Delayer. There is none worthy of worship but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: طلب المغفرة الشاملة لجميع الذنوب
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking comprehensive forgiveness for all sins

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ اغْفِـرْ لي ما قَدَّمْتُ وَما أَخَّرْت، وَما أَسْرَرْتُ وَما أَعْلَنْت، وَما أَسْرَفْت، وَما أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي، أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّر، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْت
translations.en: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have made public, what I have been excessive in, and what You know better than I. You are the Advancer and the Delayer. There is none worthy of worship but You.
translations.fr: Ô Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have made public, what I have been excessive in, and what You know better than I. You are the Advancer and the Delayer. There is none worthy of adoration but You.
translations.de: O Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have made public, what I have been excessive in, and what You know better than I. You are the Advancer and the Delayer. There is none worthy of Anbetung but You.
translations.es: Oh Allah, forgive me what I have done in the past and what I will do in the future, what I have concealed and what I have made public, what I have been excessive in, and what You know better than I. You are the Advancer and the Delayer. There is none worthy of adoración but You.

adhkar.textAr: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَتُبْ عَلَيَّ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
adhkar.textEn: Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Acceptor of repentance, the Most Merciful.
adhkar.benefitAr: كان النبي ﷺ يقولها في المجلس الواحد أكثر من مئة مرة

translations.en: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him. Glory is to Allah the Almighty.
translations.fr: Gloire à Allah and louange is to Him. Gloire à Allah the Almighty.
translations.de: Gepriesen sei Allah and Lob is to Him. Gepriesen sei Allah the Almighty.
translations.es: Gloria a Allah and alabanza is to Him. Gloria a Allah the Almighty.
translations.pt: Glória a Allah and praise is to Him. Glória a Allah the Almighty.

translations.bn: সুবহানাল্লাহ and প্রশংসা is to Him. সুবহানাল্লাহ the Almighty.

translations.vi: Vinh quang thuộc về Allah and praise is to Him. Vinh quang thuộc về Allah the Almighty.
translations.tl: Luwalhati sa Allah and praise is to Him. Luwalhati sa Allah the Almighty.
translations.ja: アッラーに栄光あれ and 称賛 is to Him. アッラーに栄光あれ the Almighty.
translations.ko: 알라에게 영광을 and 찬양 is to Him. 알라에게 영광을 the Almighty.
translations.zh-Hans: 赞颂安拉 and 赞颂 is to Him. 赞颂安拉 the Almighty.
translations.zh-Hant: 讚頌安拉 and 讚頌 is to Him. 讚頌安拉 the Almighty.

translations.uz: Allohga shon-sharaf and praise is to Him. Allohga shon-sharaf the Almighty.
translations.kk: Аллаға мақтау and praise is to Him. Аллаға мақтау the Almighty.

translations.jv: Kamulyan kanggDhuh Allah and praise is to Him. Kamulyan kanggDhuh Allah the Almighty.
translations.ml: അല്ലാഹുവിന് മഹത്വം and praise is to Him. അല്ലാഹുവിന് മഹത്വം the Almighty.
