translations.ta: அல்லாஹ்வுக்கு புகழ் and praise is to Him. அல்லாஹ்வுக்கு புகழ் the Almighty.

adhkar.textAr: سُبْحانَ اللهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لله، وَلا إِلهَ إِلاّ الله، وَاللهُ أَكْبَر
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
adhkar.benefitAr: أحب إلى النبي ﷺ مما طلعت عليه الشمس
adhkar.benefitEn: More beloved to the Prophet than everything the sun rises upon

translations.ar: سُبْحانَ اللهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لله، وَلا إِلهَ إِلاّ الله، وَاللهُ أَكْبَر
translations.en: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
translations.fr: Gloire à Allah, Louange à Allah, there is none worthy of adoration but Allah, and Allah est le Plus Grand.
translations.de: Gepriesen sei Allah, Lob sei Allah, there is none worthy of Anbetung but Allah, and Allah ist der Größte.
translations.es: Gloria a Allah, Alabado sea Allah, there is none worthy of adoración but Allah, and Allah es el Más Grande.
translations.pt: Glória a Allah, Louvado seja Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah é o Maior.
translations.pt-BR: Glória a Allah, Louvado seja Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah é o Maior.
translations.it: Gloria ad Allah, Lode ad Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah è il più Grande.
translations.nl: Glorie aan Allah, Lof zij Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is de Grootste.
translations.pl: Chwała Allahowi, Chwała Allahowi, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah jest Największy.
translations.ru: Слава Аллаху, Хвала Аллаху, there is none worthy of поклонение but Allah, and Аллах Велик.
translations.uk: Слава Аллаху, Хвала Аллаху, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Аллах Найвеличніший.
translations.tr: Sübhanallah, Elhamdülillah, there is none worthy of ibadet but Allah, and Allahu Ekber.
translations.id: Maha Suci Allah, Segala puji bagi Allah, there is none worthy of ibadah but Allah, and Allah Maha Besar.
translations.ms: Maha Suci Allah, Segala puji bagi Allah, there is none worthy of ibadat but Allah, and Allah Maha Besar.
translations.bn: সুবহানাল্লাহ, আলহামদুলিল্লাহ, there is none worthy of ইবাদত but Allah, and আল্লাহু আকবার.
translations.hi: सुब्हानल्लाह, अल्हम्दुलिल्लाह, there is none worthy of इबादत but Allah, and अल्लाहु अकबर.
translations.ur: سبحان اللہ, الحمد للہ, there is none worthy of عبادت but Allah, and اللہ اکبر.
translations.fa: سبحان الله, الحمدلله, there is none worthy of عبادت but Allah, and الله اکبر.
translations.ku: سوبحان اللە, سوپاس بۆ خوا, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and اللە گەورەترینە.
translations.sw: Utukufu ni wa Allah, Sifa zote ni za Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah ni Mkubwa kuliko wote.
translations.ha: Tsarki ga Allah, Godiya ta tabbata ga Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah shi ne Mafi Girma.
translations.so: Ammaan Allaah, Mahad Allaah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allaah waa ugu weyn.
translations.am: ክብር ለአላህ, ምስጋና ለአላህ, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and አላህ ታላቅ ነው.
translations.sq: Lavdi Allahut, Lavdërimi i takon Allahut, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allahu është më i Madhi.
translations.bs: Slava Allahu, Hvala Allahu, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah je Najveći.
translations.ro: Glorie lui Allah, Laudă lui Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah este cel mai Mare.
translations.el: Δόξα στον Αλλάχ, Δόξα τω Αλλάχ, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Ο Αλλάχ είναι ο Μέγιστος.
translations.th: สุบฮานัลลอฮ์, อัลฮัมดุลิลลาฮ์, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and อัลลอฮุอักบัร.
translations.vi: Vinh quang thuộc về Allah, Mọi lời khen ngợi thuộc về Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah vĩ đại nhất.
translations.tl: Luwalhati sa Allah, Papuri sa Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Si Allah ang Pinakadakila.
translations.ja: アッラーに栄光あれ, アッラーを称えます, there is none worthy of 崇拝 but Allah, and アッラーは最も偉大です.
translations.ko: 알라에게 영광을, 알라에게 찬양을, there is none worthy of 예배 but Allah, and 알라는 가장 위대하시다.
translations.zh-Hans: 赞颂安拉, 一切赞颂归于安拉, there is none worthy of 崇拜 but Allah, and 安拉至大.
translations.zh-Hant: 讚頌安拉, 一切讚頌歸於安拉, there is none worthy of 崇拜 but Allah, and 安拉至大.
translations.ps: سبحان الله, الحمدلله, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and الله اکبر.
translations.uz: Allohga shon-sharaf, Hamd Allohga, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Alloh buyukdir.
translations.kk: Аллаға мақтау, Мақтау Аллаға, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Аллах ұлы.
translations.az: Allaha şükür, Həmd Allaha, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah ən Böyükdür.
translations.fil: Luwalhati sa Allah, Papuri sa Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Si Allah ang Pinakadakila.
translations.jv: Kamulyan kanggDhuh Allah, Puji kanggDhuh Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah Maha Agung.
translations.ml: അല്ലാഹുവിന് മഹത്വം, അല്ലാഹുവിന് സ്തുതി, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and അല്ലാഹു അക്ബർ.
translations.my: အလ္လာဟ်အား ဂုဏ်ပြုပါ၏, အလ္လာဟ်အား ချီးမွမ်းပါ၏, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and အလ္လာဟ်သည် အကြီးမြတ်ဆုံး.
translations.nb: Ære til Allah, Pris være Allah, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah er den Største.
translations.pa: ਅੱਲਾਹ ਦੀ ਮਹਿਮਾ, ਅੱਲਾਹ ਦੀ ਸਿਫ਼ਤ, there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and ਅੱਲਾਹ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਮਹਾਨ ਹੈ.
translations.ta: அல்லாஹ்வுக்கு புகழ், அல்லாஹ்வுக்கே புகழ், there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and அல்லாஹ் மிகப் பெரியவன்.

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شَـريكَ لَـه، لَهُ الْمُلْـكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْـد، وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَـدير
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion, and His is the praise, and He is Able to do all things.
adhkar.benefitAr: كعتق عشر رقاب، وكُتبت له مائة حسنة، ومُحيت عنه مائة سيئة، وكانت له حرزاً من الشيطان حتى يُمسي
adhkar.benefitEn: Equivalent to freeing 10 slaves, 100 good deeds written, 100 sins erased, protected from Satan

translations.ar: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شَـريكَ لَـه، لَهُ الْمُلْـكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْـد، وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَـدير

adhkar.textAr: إِنَّ الصَّفـا وَالمَـرْوَةَ مِنْ شَعـائِرِ الله، أَبْـدَأُ بِما بَـدَأَ اللهُ بِـه
adhkar.textEn: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند الاقتراب من الصفا
adhkar.benefitEn: When approaching Safa

translations.ar: إِنَّ الصَّفـا وَالمَـرْوَةَ مِنْ شَعـائِرِ الله، أَبْـدَأُ بِما بَـدَأَ اللهُ بِـه
translations.en: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.fr: En vérité, Safa et Marwah sont parmi les signes d'Allah. Je commence par ce qu'Allah a commencé.
translations.de: Wahrlich, Safa und Marwa gehören zu den Zeichen Allahs. Ich beginne mit dem, womit Allah begann.
translations.es: En verdad, Safa y Marwah están entre los signos de Allah. Comienzo con lo que Allah comenzó.
translations.pt: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.pt-BR: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.it: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.nl: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.pl: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.ru: Воистину, Сафа и Марва — из знамений Аллаха. Начинаю с того, с чего начал Аллах.
translations.uk: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.tr: Şüphesiz Safa ve Merve Allah'ın nişanelerindendir. Allah'ın başladığı şeyle başlıyorum.
translations.id: Sesungguhnya Safa dan Marwah adalah di antara syi'ar Allah. Aku memulai dengan apa yang Allah mulai.
translations.ms: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.bn: নিশ্চয়ই সাফা ও মারওয়া আল্লাহর নিদর্শনসমূহের অন্তর্ভুক্ত। আল্লাহ যা দিয়ে শুরু করেছেন তা দিয়ে শুরু করি।
translations.hi: Indeed Safa and Marwah are among the signs of Allah. I begin with what Allah began with.
translations.ur: بے شک صفا اور مروہ اللہ کی نشانیوں میں سے ہیں۔ میں اس سے شروع کرتا ہوں جس سے اللہ نے شروع کیا۔

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شَـريكَ لَـه، لَـهُ المُلـكُ ولَـهُ الحَمْـد، وَهُـوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَـدير، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَه، أَنْجَـزَ وَعْـدَه، وَنَصَـرَ عَبْـدَه، وَهَـزَمَ الأَحْـزابَ وَحْـدَه
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion, and His is the praise. He is Able to do all things. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, gave victory to His servant, and He alone defeated the Confederates.
adhkar.benefitAr: على الصفا والمروة مستقبلاً الكعبة
adhkar.benefitEn: At Safa and Marwah, facing the Kaaba

translations.ar: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شَـريكَ لَـه، لَـهُ المُلـكُ ولَـهُ الحَمْـد، وَهُـوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَـدير، لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْـدَه، أَنْجَـزَ وَعْـدَه، وَنَصَـرَ عَبْـدَه، وَهَـزَمَ الأَحْـزابَ وَحْـدَه

adhkar.textAr: الدُّعَاءُ يَوْمَ عَرَفَة، وَخَيْرُ مَا قُلْتُ أَنَا وَالنَّبِيُّونَ مِنْ قَبْلِي: لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ المُلْكُ وَلَهُ الحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِير
adhkar.textEn: The supplication on the Day of Arafah, and the best thing I and the Prophets before me have said: There is no god but Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent.

adhkar.textAr: اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللهُ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، اللهُ أَكْبَرُ، وَللهِ الحَمْدُ
adhkar.textEn: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. There is no god but Allah. Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, and to Allah belongs all praise.
adhkar.benefitAr: التكبير عند رمي كل حصاة من الجمرات
adhkar.benefitEn: Saying Takbir when throwing each pebble at the Jamarat

adhkar.textAr: إِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ صِيَاحَ الدِّيَكَةِ فَاسْأَلُوا اللهَ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ، فَإِنَّهَا رَأَتْ مَلَكاً

adhkar.textAr: وَإِذَا سَمِعْتُمْ نُبَاحَ الكِلابِ وَنَهِيقَ الحَمِيرِ بِاللَّيْلِ فَتَعَوَّذُوا بِاللهِ مِنْهُنَّ فَإِنَّهُنَّ يَرَيْنَ مَا لا تَرَوْنَ
adhkar.textEn: When you hear the barking of dogs and the braying of donkeys at night, seek refuge in Allah from them, for they see what you do not see.
adhkar.benefitAr: الاستعاذة عند سماع نباح الكلاب ونهيق الحمير ليلاً
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking refuge when hearing dogs bark and donkeys bray at night

adhkar.textAr: لا بَأْسَ، طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ الله
adhkar.textEn: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال عند عيادة المريض
adhkar.benefitEn: Said when visiting the sick

translations.ar: لا بَأْسَ، طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ الله
translations.en: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, c'est une purification, si Allah le veut.
translations.de: Keine Sorge, es ist eine Reinigung, so Allah will.
translations.es: No te preocupes, es una purificación, si Allah quiere.
translations.pt: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.pt-BR: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.it: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.nl: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.pl: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.ru: Не беспокойся, это очищение, если пожелает Аллах.
translations.uk: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.tr: Endişelenme, bu bir arınmadır, inşallah.
translations.id: Jangan khawatir, ini adalah penyucian, insya Allah.
translations.ms: Jangan risau, ini adalah penyucian, insya Allah.
translations.bn: চিন্তা করো না, এটি পবিত্রতা, ইনশাআল্লাহ।
translations.hi: चिंता मत करो, यह पाकीज़गी है, इंशाअल्लाह।
translations.ur: پریشان نہ ہو، یہ پاکیزگی ہے، ان شاء اللہ۔
translations.fa: نگران نباش، این پاکیزگی است، ان‌شاءالله.
translations.ku: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.sw: Usijali, ni utakaso, Inshallah.
translations.ha: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.so: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.am: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.sq: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.bs: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.ro: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.el: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.th: ไม่ต้องกังวล นี่คือการชำระล้าง อินชาอัลลอฮ์
translations.vi: Đừng lo, đây là sự thanh tẩy, nếu Allah muốn.
translations.tl: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.ja: 心配しないで、これは浄化です、インシャーアッラー。
translations.ko: 걱정하지 마세요, 이것은 정화입니다, 인샤알라.
translations.zh-Hans: 别担心，这是净化，如果安拉意欲。
translations.zh-Hant: 別擔心，這是淨化，如果安拉意欲。
translations.ps: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.uz: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.kk: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.az: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.fil: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.

translations.nb: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.pa: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.
translations.ta: No worry, it is a purification, if Allah wills.

adhkar.textAr: أَسْأَلُ اللهَ الْعَظِيمَ، رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
adhkar.textEn: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال سبع مرات - إن لم يكن قد حان أجله يُشفى
adhkar.benefitEn: Said 7 times - if he is not going to die from it, he will be cured

translations.ar: أَسْأَلُ اللهَ الْعَظِيمَ، رَبَّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ، أَنْ يَشْفِيَكَ
translations.en: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.fr: Je demande à Allah, le Puissant, le Seigneur du Trône Immense, de te guérir.
translations.de: Ich bitte Allah, den Mächtigen, den Herrn des mächtigen Throns, dich zu heilen.
translations.es: Pido a Allah, el Poderoso, el Señor del Trono Grandioso, que te cure.
translations.pt: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.pt-BR: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.it: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.nl: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.pl: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.ru: Прошу Аллаха Великого, Господа великого Трона, исцелить тебя.
translations.uk: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.tr: Yüce Allah'tan, büyük Arş'ın Rabbinden sana şifa vermesini dilerim.
translations.id: Aku memohon kepada Allah Yang Maha Agung, Tuhan Arsy yang agung, untuk menyembuhkanmu.
translations.ms: Aku memohon kepada Allah Yang Maha Agung, Tuhan Arasy yang agung, untuk menyembuhkanmu.
translations.bn: আমি মহান আল্লাহর কাছে, মহান আরশের রবের কাছে, তোমার সুস্থতার জন্য দোয়া করি।
translations.hi: मैं अज़ीम अल्लाह से, अर्श-ए-अज़ीम के रब से, तुम्हारी शिफा की दुआ करता हूं।
translations.ur: میں اللہ عظیم سے، عرش عظیم کے رب سے، تمہارے لیے شفا کی دعا کرتا ہوں۔
translations.fa: از خداوند بزرگ، پروردگار عرش بزرگ، می‌خواهم که تو را شفا دهد.
translations.ku: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.sw: Namuomba Allah, Mwenye nguvu, Mola wa Kiti cha Enzi Kikuu, akuponye.
translations.ha: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.so: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.am: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.sq: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.bs: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.ro: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.el: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.th: ฉันขอต่ออัลลอฮ์ผู้ทรงยิ่งใหญ่ พระเจ้าแห่งบัลลังก์อันยิ่งใหญ่ ให้รักษาท่าน
translations.vi: Tôi cầu xin Allah Vĩ đại, Chúa của Ngai vàng Vĩ đại, chữa lành cho bạn.
translations.tl: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.ja: 偉大なるアッラー、偉大なる玉座の主に、あなたの治癒を祈ります。
translations.ko: 위대하신 알라, 위대한 왕좌의 주님께 당신의 치유를 기도합니다.
translations.zh-Hans: 我祈求伟大的安拉、伟大宝座的主治愈你。
translations.zh-Hant: 我祈求偉大的安拉、偉大寶座的主治癒你。
translations.ps: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.uz: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.kk: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.az: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.

translations.pa: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.
translations.ta: I ask Allah, the Mighty, the Lord of the Mighty Throne, to cure you.

adhkar.textAr: أَعُوذُ بِعِزَّةِ اللهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
adhkar.textEn: I seek refuge in Allah's might and power from the evil of what I feel and what I fear.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّ النّـاسِ، أَذْهِـبِ البَـأْسَ، وَاشْفِ أَنْـتَ الشّـافي، لا شِفـاءَ إِلاّ شِفـاؤُك، شِفـاءً لا يُغـادِرُ سَقَـما
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal. You are the Healer and there is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness behind.
adhkar.benefitAr: رقية النبي ﷺ للمريض
adhkar.benefitEn: The Prophet's ﷺ healing supplication for the sick

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّ النّـاسِ، أَذْهِـبِ البَـأْسَ، وَاشْفِ أَنْـتَ الشّـافي، لا شِفـاءَ إِلاّ شِفـاؤُك، شِفـاءً لا يُغـادِرُ سَقَـما
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and heal. You are the Healer and there is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness behind.

adhkar.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنِ حَاسِدٍ، اللهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ
adhkar.textEn: In the Name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that is harming you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye, may Allah heal you. In the Name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you.
adhkar.benefitAr: رقية شرعية للمريض
adhkar.benefitEn: Islamic healing supplication for the sick

translations.ar: بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنِ حَاسِدٍ، اللهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللهِ أَرْقِيكَ

adhkar.textAr: لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَاللّهُ أَكْبَـر، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ لهُ المُلكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَلا حَـوْلَ وَلا قُـوَّةَ إِلاّ بِالله
adhkar.textEn: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند يأس المريض من الشفاء
adhkar.benefitEn: When sick person has lost hope of recovery

translations.ar: لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَاللّهُ أَكْبَـر، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ لهُ المُلكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَلا حَـوْلَ وَلا قُـوَّةَ إِلاّ بِالله

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْتَخيـرُكَ بِعِلْمِـك، وَأَسْتَقْـدِرُكَ بِقُـدْرَتِـك، وَأَسْـأَلُـكَ مِنْ فَضْـلِكَ العَظـيم، فَإِنَّـكَ تَقْـدِرُ وَلا أَقْـدِر، وَتَعْـلَمُ وَلا أَعْـلَم، وَأَنْـتَ عَلاّمُ الغُـيوب، اللّهُـمَّ إِنْ كُنْـتَ تَعْـلَمُ أَنَّ هـذا الأَمْـرَ (يُسَمِّي حاجَتَه) خَيْـرٌ لي في ديني وَمَعـاشي وَعاقِـبَةِ أَمْـري، فَاقْـدُرْهُ لي وَيَسِّـرْهُ لي، ثُـمَّ بارِكْ لي فيه، وَإِنْ كُنْـتَ تَعْـلَمُ أَنَّ هـذا الأَمْـرَ شَـرٌّ لي في ديني وَمَعـاشي وَعاقِـبَةِ أَمْـري، فَاصْرِفْـهُ عَنِّي وَاصْرِفْني عَنْـهُ، وَاقْـدُرْ لِيَ الخَيْـرَ حَيْـثُ كانَ، ثُـمَّ أَرْضِـني بِه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek the counsel of Your Knowledge, and I seek the help of Your Omnipotence, and I beseech You for Your Magnificent Grace. Surely, You are Capable and I am not. You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know that this matter (mention your need) is good for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, then ordain it for me and make it easy for me, then bless me in it. And if You know that this matter is bad for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, then distance it from me, and distance me from it, and ordain for me what is good wherever it may be, and help me to be content with it.
adhkar.benefitAr: صلاة الاستخارة - تُقال بعد ركعتين
adhkar.benefitEn: Istikhara prayer - performed after 2 rak'at

adhkar.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ، تَوَكَّلْـتُ عَلى اللهِ، وَلا حَوْلَ وَلا قُـوَّةَ إِلاّ بِالله
adhkar.textEn: In the Name of Allah, I have placed my trust in Allah; there is no might and no power except by Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: يُقال له: هُديت وكُفيت ووُقيت، فيتنحى عنه الشيطان
adhkar.benefitEn: It will be said to him: You are guided, defended and protected. The devil will move away from him

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِـلَّ أَوْ أُضَـل، أَوْ أَزِلَّ أَوْ أُزَل، أَوْ أَظْلِـمَ أَوْ أُظْلَـم، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ أَوْ يُـجْهَلَ عَلَـيّ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I misguide others, or I am misguided by others, lest I cause others to err or I am caused to err, lest I abuse others or be abused, and lest I behave foolishly or meet with the foolishness of others.

reference.book: Abu Dawud 4/325, At-Tirmidhi 5/490, An-Nasa'i 8/268, Ibn Majah 2/336

adhkar.benefitAr: يُقال له: كُفيت وَوُقيت وَهُديت، وتنحّى عنه الشيطان
adhkar.benefitEn: It is said to him: You have been sufficed, protected and guided, and Satan turns away from him

adhkar.textAr: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَالصَّلاةُ وَالسَّلامُ عَلى رَسولِ الله، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْـلِك، اللّهُـمَّ اعْصِمْنـي مِنَ الشَّيْـطانِ الرَّجـيم
adhkar.textEn: In the Name of Allah, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask for Your favor. O Allah, protect me from Satan the outcast.

reference.book: Ibn Majah 1/129, Al-Albani graded it authentic

adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها فُتحت له أبواب الفضل
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this, the gates of bounty are opened for him

translations.ar: بِسْمِ اللهِ وَالصَّلاةُ وَالسَّلامُ عَلى رَسولِ الله، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْـلِك، اللّهُـمَّ اعْصِمْنـي مِنَ الشَّيْـطانِ الرَّجـيم

translations.ml: അല്ലാഹുവിന്റെ നാമത്തിൽ, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. അല്ലാഹുവേ, I ask for Your favor. അല്ലാഹുവേ, protect me from Satan the outcast.
translations.my: အလ္လာဟ်၏ နာမတော်ဖြင့်, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. အလ္လာဟ်ရှင်, I ask for Your favor. အလ္လာဟ်ရှင်, protect me from Satan the outcast.
translations.nb: I Allahs navn, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. Å Allah, I ask for Your favor. Å Allah, protect me from Satan the outcast.
translations.pa: ਅੱਲਾਹ ਦੇ ਨਾਮ ਨਾਲ, and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. ਹੇ ਅੱਲਾਹ, I ask for Your favor. ਹੇ ਅੱਲਾਹ, protect me from Satan the outcast.
translations.ta: அல்லாஹ்வின் பெயரால், and peace and blessings be upon the Messenger of Allah. அல்லாஹ்வே, I ask for Your favor. அல்லாஹ்வே, protect me from Satan the outcast.

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شـريكَ لَـه، لَهُ الْمُلـكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْـد، يُحْـيي وَيُميـتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لا يَموتُ، بِيَـدِهِ الْخَـيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَـدير
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is Able to do all things.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند دخول السوق - يكتب الله له ألف ألف حسنة، ويمحو عنه ألف ألف سيئة، ويرفع له ألف ألف درجة
adhkar.benefitEn: When entering the marketplace - Allah will write for him a million good deeds, erase a million bad deeds, and raise him a million levels

translations.ar: لا إِلهَ إِلاّ اللّهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شـريكَ لَـه، لَهُ الْمُلـكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْـد، يُحْـيي وَيُميـتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لا يَموتُ، بِيَـدِهِ الْخَـيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَـدير
translations.en: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is Able to do all things.
translations.fr: None has the right to be adorationped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the louange. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Living and does not die. In His Hand is all good, and He is Able to do all things.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنَّـي أَسْـأَلُـكَ خَيْـرَها، وَخَيْـرَ ما جَبَلْتَـها عَلَـيْه، وَأَعُـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّها، وَشَـرِّ ما جَبَلْـتَها عَلَـيْه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for her good and the good she is inclined toward, and I seek refuge in You from her evil and the evil she is inclined toward.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال ليلة الزفاف

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ (٢٥٥)
adhkar.textEn: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قرأها حين يُصبح أُجير من الجن حتى يُمسي
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever recites this in the morning will be protected from jinn until evening

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُۚ لَا تَأۡخُذُهُۥ سِنَةٞ وَلَا نَوۡمٞۚ لَّهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ مَن ذَا ٱلَّذِي يَشۡفَعُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۖ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيۡءٖ مِّنۡ عِلۡمِهِۦٓ إِلَّا بِمَا شَآءَۚ وَسِعَ كُرۡسِيُّهُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۖ وَلَا يَـُٔودُهُۥ حِفۡظُهُمَاۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيُّ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ (١) ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ (٢) لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ (٣) وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ (٤)
adhkar.textEn: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
adhkar.benefitAr: الإخلاص والفلق والناس ثلاث مرات تكفيك من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Al-Ikhlas, Al-Falaq, An-Nas recited 3 times will suffice you from everything

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

قُلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٌ ۝ ٱللَّهُ ٱلصَّمَدُ ۝ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ ۝ وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُۥ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌۢ
translations.en: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.fr: Dis: Il est Allah, l'Unique. Allah, le Seul à être imploré. Il n'a jamais engendré, n'a pas été engendré. Et nul n'est égal à Lui.
translations.de: Sprich: Er ist Allah, ein Einziger. Allah, der Absolute. Er zeugt nicht und ward nicht gezeugt. Und keiner ist Ihm gleich.
translations.es: Di: Él es Allah, el Único. Allah, el Absoluto. No engendró ni fue engendrado. Y no hay nadie igual a Él.
translations.pt: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.pt-BR: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.it: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.nl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.pl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.ru: Скажи: Он — Аллах Единый. Аллах Самодостаточный. Он не родил и не был рождён. И нет никого, равного Ему.
translations.uk: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.tr: De ki: O Allah'tır, birdir. Allah Samed'dir. O doğurmamış ve doğmamıştır. Hiçbir şey O'na denk değildir.
translations.id: Katakanlah: Dia-lah Allah, Yang Maha Esa. Allah adalah tempat bergantung segala sesuatu. Dia tidak beranak dan tidak pula diperanakkan. Dan tidak ada seorang pun yang setara dengan-Nya.
translations.ms: Katakanlah: Dia-lah Allah, Yang Maha Esa. Allah tempat bergantung. Dia tidak beranak dan tidak pula diperanakkan. Dan tidak ada seorang pun yang setara dengan-Nya.
translations.bn: বলুন: তিনি আল্লাহ, এক। আল্লাহ অমুখাপেক্ষী। তিনি কাউকে জন্ম দেননি এবং কেউ তাঁকে জন্ম দেয়নি। তাঁর সমতুল্য কেউ নেই।
translations.hi: कहो: वह अल्लाह है, एक। अल्लाह बेनियाज़ है। न उसने जना न वह जना गया। और कोई उसके बराबर नहीं।
translations.ur: کہو: وہ اللہ ہے، ایک ہے۔ اللہ بے نیاز ہے۔ نہ اس سے کوئی پیدا ہوا نہ وہ کسی سے پیدا ہوا۔ اور کوئی اس کا ہمسر نہیں۔
translations.fa: بگو: او خدای یکتاست. خدای بی‌نیاز. نه زاده و نه زاده شده. و هیچ‌کس همتای او نیست.
translations.ku: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.sw: Sema: Yeye ni Allah, Mmoja. Allah, Mkamilifu. Hakuzaa wala hakuzaliwa. Na hakuna yeyote anayefanana naye.
translations.ha: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.so: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.am: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.sq: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.bs: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.ro: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.el: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.th: จงกล่าวเถิด: พระองค์คืออัลลอฮ์ ผู้ทรงเอกะ อัลลอฮ์ทรงเป็นที่พึ่ง พระองค์ไม่ประสูติและไม่ถูกประสูติ และไม่มีผู้ใดเสมอเหมือนพระองค์
translations.vi: Hãy nói: Ngài là Allah, Đấng Duy Nhất. Allah, Đấng Tự Tại. Ngài không sinh ra và cũng không được sinh ra. Và không có ai sánh bằng Ngài.
translations.tl: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
translations.ja: 言え：彼はアッラー、唯一の方。アッラー、永遠なる方。彼は生まず、生まれず。彼に比べられる者は何もない。
translations.ko: 말하라: 그분은 알라이시니 유일하신 분. 알라는 자족하시는 분. 낳지도 않으셨고 나지도 않으셨으며. 그분과 동등한 것은 아무것도 없노라.
translations.zh-Hans: 你说：他是安拉，是独一的主。安拉是万物所仰赖的。他没有生产，也没有被生产。没有任何物可以做他的匹敌。
translations.zh-Hant: 你說：他是安拉，是獨一的主。安拉是萬物所仰賴的。他沒有生產，也沒有被生產。沒有任何物可以做他的匹敵。
translations.ps: Say: He is Allah, the One. Allah, the Self-Sufficient Master. He begets not, nor was He begotten. And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ (١) مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ (٢) وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ (٣) وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ (٤) وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ (٥)
adhkar.textEn: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the daybreak. From the evil of what He has created. And from the evil of the darkening as it comes with its darkness. And from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots. And from the evil of the envier when he envies.
adhkar.benefitAr: قراءتها ثلاث مرات صباحاً ومساءً تكفي من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Reading it three times morning and evening suffices from everything

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلْفَلَقِ ۝ مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ ٱلنَّفَّٰثَٰتِ فِى ٱلْعُقَدِ ۝ وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ

adhkar.textAr:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ (١) مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٢) إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٣) مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ (٤) ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ (٥) مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ (٦)
adhkar.textEn: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind. The King of mankind. The God of mankind. From the evil of the retreating whisperer. Who whispers in the breasts of mankind. Of jinn and men.
adhkar.benefitAr: قراءتها ثلاث مرات صباحاً ومساءً تكفي من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Reading it three times morning and evening suffices from everything

translations.ar:
بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ

قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مَلِكِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ إِلَٰهِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مِن شَرِّ ٱلْوَسْوَاسِ ٱلْخَنَّاسِ ۝ ٱلَّذِى يُوَسْوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلنَّاسِ ۝ مِنَ ٱلْجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ
translations.en: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind. The King of mankind. The God of mankind. From the evil of the retreating whisperer. Who whispers in the breasts of mankind. Of jinn and men.

adhkar.textAr: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
adhkar.textEn: We have entered a new day and with it all dominion belongs to Allah. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Him belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He has power over all things. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day and the good of what comes after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil of what comes after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the Fire and the punishment of the grave.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها حين يصبح أدى شكر يومه
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this in the morning has fulfilled the gratitude of his day

translations.ar: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لاَ إِلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لاَ شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ

My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day and the good of what comes after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil of what comes after it. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ بِكَ أَصْـبَحْنا وَبِكَ أَمْسَـينا، وَبِكَ نَحْـيا وَبِكَ نَمـوتُ وَإِلَـيْكَ النُّـشور
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the Final Return.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها حين يصبح ويمسي كفته من كل شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this morning and evening, it will suffice him from everything

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّـي لا إِلَـهَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنـي وَأَنا عَبْـدُك، وَأَنا عَلـى عَهْـدِكَ وَوَعْـدِكَ ما اسْتَـطَعْـت، أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّ ما صَنَـعْت، أَبـوءُ لَـكَ بِنِعْـمَتِـكَ عَلَـيَّ، وَأَبـوءُ بِذَنْـبي فَاغْفـِرْ لي فَإِنَّـهُ لا يَغْـفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, You are my Lord, there is none worthy of worship but You. You created me and I am Your slave. I keep Your covenant, and my pledge to You so far as I am able. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your blessings upon me, and I acknowledge my sins. Forgive me, for there is none who may forgive sins but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: سيد الاستغفار. من قالها موقناً بها حين يُصبح فمات من يومه دخل الجنة
adhkar.benefitEn: Sayyid al-Istighfar - Master of seeking forgiveness. Whoever says it with conviction in the day and dies will enter Paradise

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَصْبَـحْتُ أُشْـهِدُك، وَأُشْـهِدُ حَمَلَـةَ عَـرْشِـك، وَمَلائِكَتِك، وَجَمـيعَ خَلْـقِك، أَنَّـكَ أَنْتَ اللهُ لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْـتَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، وَأَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُكَ وَرَسـولُـك
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I have entered a new morning and I call upon You and upon the bearers of Your Throne, upon Your angels and all creation to bear witness that surely You are Allah. There is none worthy of worship but You alone. You have no partners. And that Muhammad is Your slave and Your Messenger.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها أربع مرات أعتقه الله من النار
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says it 4 times, Allah will free him from the Fire

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَصْبَـحْتُ أُشْـهِدُك، وَأُشْـهِدُ حَمَلَـةَ عَـرْشِـك، وَمَلائِكَتِك، وَجَمـيعَ خَلْـقِك، أَنَّـكَ أَنْتَ اللهُ لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْـتَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، وَأَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُكَ وَرَسـولُـك
translations.en: O Allah, I have entered a new morning and I call upon You and upon the bearers of Your Throne, upon Your angels and all creation to bear witness that surely You are Allah. There is none worthy of worship but You alone. You have no partners. And that Muhammad is Your slave and Your Messenger.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ ما أَصْبَـحَ بي مِـنْ نِعْـمَةٍ أَو بِأَحَـدٍ مِـنْ خَلْـقِك، فَمِـنْكَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، فَلَـكَ الْحَمْـدُ وَلَـكَ الشُّكْـر
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, whatever blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner. So for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها فقد أدَّى شُكر يومه
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this has fulfilled his obligation to give thanks for that day

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ ما أَصْبَـحَ بي مِـنْ نِعْـمَةٍ أَو بِأَحَـدٍ مِـنْ خَلْـقِك، فَمِـنْكَ وَحْـدَكَ لا شَريكَ لَـك، فَلَـكَ الْحَمْـدُ وَلَـكَ الشُّكْـر

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَدَنـي، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في سَمْـعي، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَصَـري، لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْـتَ

adhkar.textAr: حَسْبِـيَ اللّهُ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ هُوَ عَلَـيهِ تَوَكَّـلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظـيم
adhkar.textEn: Allah is sufficient for me. There is none worthy of worship but Him. I have placed my trust in Him, He is Lord of the Majestic Throne.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها سبع مرات حين يُصبح وحين يُمسي كفاه الله ما أهمه من أمر الدنيا والآخرة
adhkar.benefitEn: Allah will grant whoever recites this seven times in the morning and evening whatever he desires from this world or the next

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في الدُّنْـيا وَالآخِـرَة، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في ديني وَدُنْـيايَ وَأَهْـلي وَمالـي، اللّهُـمَّ اسْتُـرْ عَوْراتي وَآمِـنْ رَوْعاتـي، اللّهُـمَّ احْفَظْـني مِن بَـينِ يَدَيَّ وَمِن خَلْفـي وَعَن يَمـيني وَعَن شِمـالي، وَمِن فَوْقـي، وَأَعـوذُ بِعَظَمَـتِكَ أَن أُغْـتالَ مِن تَحْتـي
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish. O Allah, guard me from what is in front of me and behind me, from my left, and from my right, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.
adhkar.benefitAr: من أعظم أدعية طلب العفو والعافية
adhkar.benefitEn: One of the greatest supplications for seeking pardon and wellbeing

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في الدُّنْـيا وَالآخِـرَة، اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ العَفْوَ وَالعافِـيةَ في ديني وَدُنْـيايَ وَأَهْـلي وَمالـي، اللّهُـمَّ اسْتُـرْ عَوْراتي وَآمِـنْ رَوْعاتـي، اللّهُـمَّ احْفَظْـني مِن بَـينِ يَدَيَّ وَمِن خَلْفـي وَعَن يَمـيني وَعَن شِمـالي، وَمِن فَوْقـي، وَأَعـوذُ بِعَظَمَـتِكَ أَن أُغْـتالَ مِن تَحْتـي
translations.en: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish. O Allah, guard me from what is in front of me and behind me, from my left, and from my right, and from above me. I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ عالِـمَ الغَـيْبِ وَالشّـهادَةِ فاطِـرَ السّماواتِ وَالأرْضِ رَبَّ كـلِّ شَيءٍ وَمَليـكَه، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ أَنْت، أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِن شَـرِّ نَفْسـي وَمِن شَـرِّ الشَّيْـطانِ وَشِـرْكِه، وَأَنْ أَقْتَـرِفَ عَلـى نَفْسـي سوءاً أَوْ أَجُـرَّهُ إِلـى مُسْـلِم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his shirk, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
adhkar.benefitAr: الاستعاذة من شر النفس والشيطان
adhkar.benefitEn: Seeking refuge from the evil of oneself and Satan

adhkar.textAr: بِسـمِ اللهِ الذي لا يَضُـرُّ مَعَ اسمِـهِ شَيءٌ في الأرْضِ وَلا في السّمـاءِ وَهـوَ السّمـيعُ العَلـيم
adhkar.textEn: In the Name of Allah, with Whose Name nothing on the earth or in the heaven can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

reference.book: Abu Dawud 4/323, At-Tirmidhi 5/465, Ibn Majah, Ahmad

adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها ثلاث مرات حين يُصبح وحين يُمسي لم يضره شيء
adhkar.benefitEn: Nothing will harm whoever recites this three times in the morning and evening

translations.ar: بِسـمِ اللهِ الذي لا يَضُـرُّ مَعَ اسمِـهِ شَيءٌ في الأرْضِ وَلا في السّمـاءِ وَهـوَ السّمـيعُ العَلـيم

adhkar.textAr: رَضيـتُ بِاللهِ رَبَّـاً وَبِالإسْلامِ ديـناً وَبِمُحَـمَّدٍ صلى الله عليه وسلم نَبِيّـاً
adhkar.textEn: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion and with Muhammad as my Prophet.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها ثلاثاً حين يُصبح وثلاثاً حين يُمسي كفاه الله ما أهمه
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever recites this 3 times in the morning and evening, Allah will satisfy him on the Day of Resurrection

adhkar.textAr: يا حَـيُّ يا قَيّـومُ بِـرَحْمَـتِكِ أَسْتَـغـيث، أَصْلِـحْ لي شَـأْنـي كُلَّـه، وَلا تَكِلْـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـين
adhkar.textEn: O Ever Living One, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your Mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها أصلح الله له شأنه كله
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this, Allah will rectify all his affairs

translations.ar: يا حَـيُّ يا قَيّـومُ بِـرَحْمَـتِكِ أَسْتَـغـيث، أَصْلِـحْ لي شَـأْنـي كُلَّـه، وَلا تَكِلْـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـين

adhkar.textAr: أَصْبَـحْـنا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ الإسْلام، وَعَلَى كَلِـمَةِ الإخْـلاص، وَعَلَى دينِ نَبِـيِّنا مُحَـمَّدٍ صَلّـى اللهُ عَلَيْـهِ وَسَلَّـم، وَعَلَى مِلَّـةِ أَبينـا إِبْـراهيـمَ حَنيفاً مُسْلِماً وَمـا كانَ مِنَ الْمُشْـرِكين
adhkar.textEn: We have entered a new day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright, a Muslim, and he was not of those who worship others besides Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: الإصباح على فطرة الإسلام وكلمة الإخلاص
adhkar.benefitEn: Beginning the morning upon the natural way of Islam and the word of sincerity

translations.ar: أَصْبَـحْـنا عَلَى فِطْرَةِ الإسْلام، وَعَلَى كَلِـمَةِ الإخْـلاص، وَعَلَى دينِ نَبِـيِّنا مُحَـمَّدٍ صَلّـى اللهُ عَلَيْـهِ وَسَلَّـم، وَعَلَى مِلَّـةِ أَبينـا إِبْـراهيـمَ حَنيفاً مُسْلِماً وَمـا كانَ مِنَ الْمُشْـرِكين
translations.en: We have entered a new day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright, a Muslim, and he was not of those who worship others besides Allah.
translations.fr: We have entered a new day upon the natural religion of Islam, the word of sincere devotion, the religion of our Prophète Muhammad (peace be upon him), and the faith of our father Ibrahim. He was upright, a Muslim, and he was not of those who adoration others besides Allah.

adhkar.textAr: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him.
adhkar.benefitAr: من قالها مائة مرة حين يُصبح وحين يُمسي لم يأتِ أحد يوم القيامة بأفضل مما جاء به إلا من قال مثلها أو زاد
adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever says this 100 times in the morning and evening, none will come on the Day of Resurrection with anything better except one who did more

adhkar.textAr: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
adhkar.textEn: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things.
adhkar.benefitAr: كعتق عشر رقاب، وكُتبت له عشر حسنات، ومُحيت عنه عشر سيئات، ورُفع عشر درجات، وكانت حرزاً من الشيطان حتى يُمسي
adhkar.benefitEn: Like freeing 10 slaves, 10 good deeds written, 10 sins erased, raised 10 levels, protected from Satan until evening

adhkar.textAr: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ: عَدَدَ خَلْـقِه، وَرِضـا نَفْسِـه، وَزِنَـةَ عَـرْشِـه، وَمِـدادَ كَلِمـاتِـه
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.
adhkar.benefitAr: أفضل من التسبيح العادي، أجرها عظيم
adhkar.benefitEn: Better than regular glorification, its reward is immense

translations.ar: سُبْحـانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْـدِهِ: عَدَدَ خَلْـقِه، وَرِضـا نَفْسِـه، وَزِنَـةَ عَـرْشِـه، وَمِـدادَ كَلِمـاتِـه

adhkar.textAr: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ، وَالْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ، وَالْبُخْلِ وَالْجُبْنِ، وَضَلَعِ الدَّيْنِ، وَغَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry and grief, from helplessness and laziness, from cowardice and stinginess, from the burden of debts and from being overpowered by men.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan, wal-'ajzi wal-kasal, wal-bukhli wal-jubn, wa dala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijal
adhkar.benefitAr: كان النبي ﷺ كثيرًا ما يقول هذا الدعاء، يتعوذ من ثمانية أشياء تُعيق العبد عن الخير
adhkar.benefitEn: The Prophet (peace be upon him) frequently made this supplication, seeking refuge from eight things that hinder a person from doing good

adhkar.textEn: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad and upon the family of Muhammad.
adhkar.transliterationEn: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammadin wa 'ala aali Muhammad

reference.book: Majma' Az-Zawa'id by Al-Haythami (17022), Al-Jami' As-Saghir by As-Suyuti (11303), At-Targhib wat-Tarhib by Al-Mundhiri (987), An-Nasa'i (1297)
reference.narrator: Abu Ad-Darda' and Anas ibn Malik

adhkar.benefitEn: Whoever sends blessings upon me 10 times in the morning and 10 times in the evening, my intercession will reach him on the Day of Resurrection

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُمَّ لَكَ الحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيهِ، أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ خَيْرِهِ وَخَيْرِ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from its evil and the evil of what it has been made for.
adhkar.benefitAr: حمد الله على نعمة الكسوة والاستعاذة من شرها
adhkar.benefitEn: Thanking Allah for clothing and seeking protection from its harm

adhkar.textAr: اللهُ أَكْـبَر، اللّهُـمَّ أَهِلَّـهُ عَلَيْـنا بِالأَمْـنِ وَالإيمـان، وَالسَّلامَـةِ وَالإِسْلام، وَالتَّـوْفيـقِ لِما تُحِـبُّ رَبَّنـا وَتَـرْضـى، رَبُّنـا وَرَبُّكَ الله
adhkar.textEn: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
adhkar.benefitAr: عند رؤية الهلال
adhkar.benefitEn: Upon sighting the new crescent moon

translations.ar: اللهُ أَكْـبَر، اللّهُـمَّ أَهِلَّـهُ عَلَيْـنا بِالأَمْـنِ وَالإيمـان، وَالسَّلامَـةِ وَالإِسْلام، وَالتَّـوْفيـقِ لِما تُحِـبُّ رَبَّنـا وَتَـرْضـى، رَبُّنـا وَرَبُّكَ الله
translations.en: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.fr: Allah est le Plus Grand. Ô Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.de: Allah ist der Größte. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.es: Allah es el Más Grande. Oh Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.pt: Allah é o Maior. Ó Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
translations.pt-BR: Allah é o Maior. Ó Allah, bring us the new moon with security and faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.

adhkar.textAr: بَارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ فِي المَوْهُوبِ لَكَ، وَشَكَرْتَ الوَاهِبَ، وَبَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ، وَرُزِقْتَ بِرَّهُ
adhkar.textEn: May Allah bless you with His gift to you, and may you give thanks to the Giver, and may the child reach the age of maturity, and may you be granted its righteousness.
adhkar.benefitAr: تهنئة من رُزق بمولود جديد

adhkar.textAr: لا إِلَهَ إِلاّ اللهُ الوَاحِدُ القَهَّارُ، رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا العَزِيزُ الغَفَّار
adhkar.textEn: There is no god but Allah, the One, the Dominant, Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, the All-Mighty, the Oft-Forgiving.

reference.book: Al-Hakim 1/540, An-Nasa'i in Amal al-Yawm wal-Laylah

adhkar.benefitAr: ذكر الله عند التقلب في الفراش ليلاً

adhkar.textAr: سُبْحانَكَ اللّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعالى جَدُّكَ، وَلا إِلَهَ غَيْرُك
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء الاستفتاح
adhkar.benefitEn: Opening supplication (Dua al-Istiftah)

translations.ar: سُبْحانَكَ اللّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعالى جَدُّكَ، وَلا إِلَهَ غَيْرُك
translations.en: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
translations.fr: Glory is to You Ô Allah, and louange. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of adoration but You.
translations.de: Glory is to You O Allah, and Lob. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of Anbetung but You.
translations.es: Glory is to You Oh Allah, and alabanza. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of adoración but You.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ باعِـدْ بَيْـني وَبَيْـنَ خَطـايايَ كَما باعَـدْتَ بَيْـنَ المَشْـرِقِ وَالمَغْـرِب، اللّهُـمَّ نَقِّـني مِنْ خَطايايَ كَمـا يُـنَقَّى الثَّـوْبُ الأَبْـيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَـس، اللّهُـمَّ اغْسِلْـني مِنْ خَطايـايَ بِالثَّلْـجِ وَالمـاءِ وَالْبَـرَد
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah, wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
adhkar.benefitAr: من أدعية استفتاح الصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: One of the opening supplications of prayer

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ باعِـدْ بَيْـني وَبَيْـنَ خَطـايايَ كَما باعَـدْتَ بَيْـنَ المَشْـرِقِ وَالمَغْـرِب، اللّهُـمَّ نَقِّـني مِنْ خَطايايَ كَمـا يُـنَقَّى الثَّـوْبُ الأَبْـيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَـس، اللّهُـمَّ اغْسِلْـني مِنْ خَطايـايَ بِالثَّلْـجِ وَالمـاءِ وَالْبَـرَد
translations.en: O Allah, separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah, wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.

adhkar.textAr: التَّحِـيّـاتُ لِلهِ وَالصَّلَـواتُ وَالطَّيِّـبات، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـكَ أَيُّهـا النَّبِـيُّ وَرَحْمَـةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكاتُـه، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـنا وَعَلـى عِبـادِ للهِ الصَّـالِحـين، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ الله، وَأَشْـهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُهُ وَرَسـولُه
adhkar.textEn: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
adhkar.benefitAr: التشهد
adhkar.benefitEn: At-Tashahhud

translations.ar: التَّحِـيّـاتُ لِلهِ وَالصَّلَـواتُ وَالطَّيِّـبات، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـكَ أَيُّهـا النَّبِـيُّ وَرَحْمَـةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكاتُـه، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـنا وَعَلـى عِبـادِ للهِ الصَّـالِحـين، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ الله، وَأَشْـهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُهُ وَرَسـولُه
translations.en: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
translations.fr: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prières and goodness. que la paix soit sur toi, O Prophète, and the miséricorde of Allah and His bénédictions. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous serviteurs of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of adoration but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His serviteur and His Messager.
translations.de: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all Gebets and goodness. Friede sei mit dir, O Prophet, and the Barmherzigkeit of Allah and His Segens. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of Anbetung but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Gesandter.
translations.es: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all oracións and goodness. la paz sea contigo, O Profeta, and the misericordia of Allah and His bendicións. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ صَلِّ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا صَلَّيْـتَ عَلـى إِبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إِبْراهـيم، إِنَّـكَ حَميـدٌ مَجـيد، اللّهُـمَّ بارِكْ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا بارَكْتَ عَلـى إِبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إِبْراهـيم، إِنَّـكَ حَميـدٌ مَجـيد
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on Ibrahim and on the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim. You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious.
adhkar.benefitAr: الصلاة على النبي بعد التشهد
adhkar.benefitEn: Salawat upon the Prophet after Tashahhud

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ صَلِّ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا صَلَّيْـتَ عَلـى إِبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إِبْراهـيم، إِنَّـكَ حَميـدٌ مَجـيد، اللّهُـمَّ بارِكْ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا بارَكْتَ عَلـى إِبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إِبْراهـيم، إِنَّـكَ حَميـدٌ مَجـيد

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر، وَمِـنْ عَذابِ جَهَـنَّم، وَمِـنْ فِتْـنَةِ الْمَحْـيا وَالْمَمـات، وَمِـنْ شَـرِّ فِتْـنَةِ الْمَسيحِ الدَّجّال
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and from the punishment of Hell-fire, and from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
adhkar.benefitAr: قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: Before the final Salam

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّ جِـبْرائيل ، وَميكـائيل ، وَإِسْـرافيل، فاطِـرَ السَّمواتِ وَالأَرْض ، عالـِمَ الغَيْـبِ وَالشَّهـادَةِ أَنْـتَ تَحْـكمُ بَيْـنَ عِبـادِكَ فيـما كانوا فيهِ يَخْتَلِفـون. اهدِنـي لِمـا اخْتُـلِفَ فيـهِ مِنَ الْحَـقِّ بِإِذْنِك ، إِنَّـكَ تَهْـدي مَنْ تَشـاءُ إِلى صِراطٍ مُسْتَقـيم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, Lord of Jibril, Mika'il and Israfil, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of the unseen and the seen, You judge between Your servants in what they differ. Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء استفتاح صلاة الليل
adhkar.benefitEn: Opening supplication for night prayer

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ رَبَّ جِـبْرائيل ، وَميكـائيل ، وَإِسْـرافيل، فاطِـرَ السَّمواتِ وَالأَرْض ، عالـِمَ الغَيْـبِ وَالشَّهـادَةِ أَنْـتَ تَحْـكمُ بَيْـنَ عِبـادِكَ فيـما كانوا فيهِ يَخْتَلِفـون. اهدِنـي لِمـا اخْتُـلِفَ فيـهِ مِنَ الْحَـقِّ بِإِذْنِك ، إِنَّـكَ تَهْـدي مَنْ تَشـاءُ إِلى صِراطٍ مُسْتَقـيم
translations.en: O Allah, Lord of Jibril, Mika'il and Israfil, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of the unseen and the seen, You judge between Your servants in what they differ. Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.
translations.fr: Ô Allah, Lord of Jibril, Mika'il and Israfil, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Knower of the unseen and the seen, You judge between Your serviteurs in what they differ. Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.

Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.

Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.

Guide me to the truth in what they differ about by Your permission. Indeed, You guide whom You will to a straight path.

adhkar.textAr: اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَسُبْـحانَ اللهِ بكْـرَةً وَأَصيـلا
adhkar.textEn: Allah is the Greatest, Most Great (three times). Praise is to Allah, abundantly (three times). Glory is to Allah, at the break of day and at its end.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء استفتاح الصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: Opening supplication for prayer

translations.ar: اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، اللهُ أَكْبَـرُ كَبـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَالْحَـمْدُ للهِ كَثـيرا ، وَسُبْـحانَ اللهِ بكْـرَةً وَأَصيـلا

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ نـورُ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ قَيِّـمُ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ رَبُّ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, praise is to You. You are the Light of the heavens and the earth and all that they contain. Praise is to You, You are the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all they contain. Praise is to You, You are the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all they contain.
adhkar.benefitAr: دعاء الاستفتاح
adhkar.benefitEn: Opening supplication

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ نـورُ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ قَيِّـمُ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن ، وَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ رَبُّ السَّمـواتِ وَالأَرْضِ وَمَنْ فيـهِن
translations.en: O Allah, praise is to You. You are the Light of the heavens and the earth and all that they contain. Praise is to You, You are the Sustainer of the heavens and the earth and all they contain. Praise is to You, You are the Lord of the heavens and the earth and all they contain.

translations.en: Glory (to You), Most Holy (are You), Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
translations.fr: Gloire (à Toi), Très Saint (Tu es), Seigneur des anges et de l'Esprit.

adhkar.textEn: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال في الركوع أو السجود

translations.ar: سُبْـحانَ ذي الْجَبَـروت، والمَلَـكوت، وَالكِبْـرِياء، وَالْعَظَـمَةِ
translations.en: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
translations.fr: Gloire à Toi, Maître de la puissance, de la royauté, de la majesté et de la grandeur.
translations.de: Gepriesen seist Du, Herr der Macht, der Herrschaft, der Majestät und Größe.
translations.es: Gloria a Ti, Dueño del poder, del dominio, de la majestad y la grandeza.
translations.pt: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.

translations.tr: Seni tesbih ederim, ceberût, melekût, kibriyâ ve azamet sahibi.
translations.id: Maha Suci Engkau, Pemilik kekuasaan, kerajaan, keagungan dan kebesaran.

adhkar.textAr: مِلْءَ السَّمـواتِ وَمِلْءَ الأَرْض، وَما بَيْـنَهُمـا ، وَمِلْءَ ما شِئْـتَ مِنْ شَيءٍ بَعْـد . أَهـلَ الثَّـناءِ وَالمَجـد ، أََحَـقُّ ما قالَ العَبْـد ، وَكُلُّـنا لَكَ عَـبد . اللّهُـمَّ لا مانِعَ لِما أَعْطَـيْت ، وَلا مُعْطِـيَ لِما مَنَـعْت ، وَلا يَنْفَـعُ ذا الجَـدِّ مِنْـكَ الجَـد
adhkar.textEn: (A praise that) fills the heavens and the earth and what lies between them, and whatever else You please. You are most worthy of praise and majesty. O Allah, there is none who can withhold what You give, and none may give what You have withheld. And the might of the mighty person cannot benefit him against You.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال بعد الرفع من الركوع
adhkar.benefitEn: Said after rising from bowing

translations.ar: مِلْءَ السَّمـواتِ وَمِلْءَ الأَرْض، وَما بَيْـنَهُمـا ، وَمِلْءَ ما شِئْـتَ مِنْ شَيءٍ بَعْـد . أَهـلَ الثَّـناءِ وَالمَجـد ، أََحَـقُّ ما قالَ العَبْـد ، وَكُلُّـنا لَكَ عَـبد . اللّهُـمَّ لا مانِعَ لِما أَعْطَـيْت ، وَلا مُعْطِـيَ لِما مَنَـعْت ، وَلا يَنْفَـعُ ذا الجَـدِّ مِنْـكَ الجَـد

adhkar.textAr: سُبْـحانَ رَبِّـيَ الأَعْلـى
adhkar.textEn: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.

reference.book: Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, An-Nasa'i, At-Tirmidhi, Ahmad

adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال في السجود
adhkar.benefitEn: Said while prostrating

translations.ar: سُبْـحانَ رَبِّـيَ الأَعْلـى
translations.en: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
translations.fr: Gloire à mon Seigneur, le Très-Haut.
translations.de: Gepriesen sei mein Herr, der Höchste.
translations.es: Gloria a mi Señor, el Altísimo.
translations.pt: Glória ao meu Senhor, o Altíssimo.
translations.pt-BR: Glória ao meu Senhor, o Altíssimo.
translations.it: Gloria al mio Signore, l'Altissimo.
translations.nl: Glorie aan mijn Heer, de Allerhoogste.
translations.pl: Chwała mojemu Panu, Najwyższemu.
translations.ru: Пречист мой Господь, Всевышний.
translations.uk: Пречистий мій Господь, Всевишній.
translations.tr: Sübhane Rabbiyel A'la.
translations.id: Maha Suci Tuhanku Yang Maha Tinggi.
translations.ms: Maha Suci Tuhanku Yang Maha Tinggi.
translations.bn: আমার রবের পবিত্রতা, যিনি সর্বোচ্চ।
translations.hi: पाक है मेरा रब जो सबसे बुलंद है।
translations.ur: پاک ہے میرا رب جو سب سے بلند ہے۔
translations.fa: پاک است پروردگار من، والامرتبه.
translations.ku: پاک بێت پەروەردگارم، بەرزترین.
translations.sw: Utukufu kwa Mola wangu, Aliye Juu Zaidi.
translations.ha: Tsarki ya tabbata ga Ubangijina, Mafi daukaka.
translations.so: Ammaan Rabbigay, kan ugu sarreeya.
translations.am: ክብር ለጌታዬ፣ ለከፍተኛው።
translations.sq: Lavdi Zotit tim, më të Lartit.
translations.bs: Slava Gospodaru mome, Svevišnjem.
translations.ro: Slavă Domnului meu, cel Preaînalt.
translations.el: Δόξα στον Κύριό μου, τον Υψηλότατο.
translations.th: สุบฮานะ รอบบิยัล อะอ์ลา
translations.vi: Vinh quang thuộc về Chúa tôi, Đấng Tối Cao.
translations.tl: Kaluwalhatian sa aking Panginoon, ang Kataas-taasan.
translations.ja: 私の主、至高者に栄光あれ。
translations.ko: 나의 주님, 가장 높으신 분께 영광을.
translations.zh-Hans: 赞颂我的主，至高者。
translations.zh-Hant: 讚頌我的主，至高者。
translations.ps: زما د رب پاکوالی، چې تر ټولو لوړ دی.
translations.uz: Mening Rabbimga, Oliy zotga shon-sharaf.
translations.kk: Менің Раббыма, Жоғарғыға мақтау.
translations.az: Rəbbimə, Ən Ucaya şükür.
translations.fil: Kaluwalhatian sa aking Panginoon, ang Kataas-taasan.
translations.jv: Kamulyan kanggo Gustiku, Kang Maha Luhur.
translations.ml: എന്റെ രക്ഷിതാവിന് മഹത്വം, അത്യുന്നതന്.
translations.my: ကျွန်တော်၏ အရှင်သခင်အား ဂုဏ်ပြုပါ၏၊ အမြင့်ဆုံး။
translations.nb: Ære til min Herre, den Høyeste.
translations.pa: ਮੇਰੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਪਾਕੀ, ਜੋ ਸਭ ਤੋਂ ਉੱਚਾ ਹੈ।
translations.ta: என் இறைவனுக்கு புகழ், மிக உயர்ந்தவன்.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ لَكَ سَـجَدْتُ وَبِـكَ آمَنْـت ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَـمْت ، سَجَـدَ وَجْهـي للَّـذي خَلَقَـهُ وَصَـوَّرَهُ وَشَقَّ سَمْـعَـهُ وَبَصَـرَه ، تَبـارَكَ اللهُ أَحْسـنُ الخـالِقيـن
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال في السجود
adhkar.benefitEn: Said while prostrating

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ اغْفِـرْ لي ذَنْـبي كُلَّـه ، دِقَّـهُ وَجِلَّـه ، وَأَوَّلَـهُ وَآخِـرَه ، وَعَلانِيَّتَـهُ وَسِـرَّه
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال في السجود
adhkar.benefitEn: Said while prostrating

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِرِضـاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِـك ، وَبِمعـافاتِـكَ مِنْ عُقوبَـتِك ، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْـك ، لا أُحْصـي ثَنـاءً عَلَـيْك ، أَنْـتَ كَمـا أَثْنَـيْتَ عَلـى نَفْسـِك
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.
adhkar.benefitAr: تُقال في السجود
adhkar.benefitEn: Said while prostrating

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِرِضـاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِـك ، وَبِمعـافاتِـكَ مِنْ عُقوبَـتِك ، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْـك ، لا أُحْصـي ثَنـاءً عَلَـيْك ، أَنْـتَ كَمـا أَثْنَـيْتَ عَلـى نَفْسـِك
translations.en: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.

adhkar.textAr: سَجَـدَ وَجْهـي للَّـذي خَلَقَـهُ وَشَقَّ سَمْـعَـهُ وَبَصَـرَهُ بِحَـوْلِـهِ وَقُـوَّتِهِ ، فَتَبـارَكَ اللهُ أَحْسـنُ الخـالِقيـن
adhkar.textEn: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
adhkar.benefitAr: سجود التلاوة

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ اكْتُـبْ لي بِهـا عِنْـدَكَ أَجْـراً ، وَضَـعْ عَنِّـي بِهـا وِزْراً ، وَاجْعَـلها لي عِنْـدَكَ ذُخْـراً ، وَتَقَبَّـلها مِنِّي كَمَا تَقَبَّلْتَهَا مِنْ عَبْدِكَ دَاوُدَ
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a treasure for me with You. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
adhkar.benefitAr: سجود التلاوة
adhkar.benefitEn: Prostration during Quran recitation

adhkar.textAr: التَّحِيّـاتُ للهِ وَالصَّلَـواتُ والطَّيِّـبات ، السَّلامُ عَلَيـكَ أَيُّهـا النَّبِـيُّ وَرَحْمَـةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكـاتُه ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـناوَعَلـى عِبـادِ للهِ الصَّـالِحـين . أَشْـهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ الله ، وَأَشْـهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُهُ وَرَسـولُه
adhkar.textEn: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
adhkar.benefitAr: التشهد في الصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: The Tashahhud in prayer

translations.ar: التَّحِيّـاتُ للهِ وَالصَّلَـواتُ والطَّيِّـبات ، السَّلامُ عَلَيـكَ أَيُّهـا النَّبِـيُّ وَرَحْمَـةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكـاتُه ، السَّلامُ عَلَيْـناوَعَلـى عِبـادِ للهِ الصَّـالِحـين . أَشْـهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلـهَ إِلاّ الله ، وَأَشْـهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمّـداً عَبْـدُهُ وَرَسـولُه
translations.en: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
translations.fr: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prières and goodness. que la paix soit sur toi, O Prophète, and the miséricorde of Allah and His bénédictions. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous serviteurs of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of adoration but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His serviteur and His Messager.
translations.de: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all Gebets and goodness. Friede sei mit dir, O Prophet, and the Barmherzigkeit of Allah and His Segens. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of Anbetung but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Gesandter.
translations.es: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all oracións and goodness. la paz sea contigo, O Profeta, and the misericordia of Allah and His bendicións. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of adoración but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Mensajero.

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ صَلِّ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّد، كَمـا صَلَّيـتَ عَلـى إبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إبْراهـيم، إِنَّكَ حَمـيدٌ مَجـيد ، اللّهُـمَّ بارِكْ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا بارِكْتَ عَلـى إبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إبْراهيم، إِنَّكَ حَمـيدٌ مَجـيد
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on Ibrahim and on the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious.
adhkar.benefitAr: الصلاة على النبي في الصلاة بعد التشهد
adhkar.benefitEn: Salawat in prayer after Tashahhud

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ صَلِّ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّد، كَمـا صَلَّيـتَ عَلـى إبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إبْراهـيم، إِنَّكَ حَمـيدٌ مَجـيد ، اللّهُـمَّ بارِكْ عَلـى مُحمَّـد، وَعَلـى آلِ مُحمَّـد، كَمـا بارِكْتَ عَلـى إبْراهـيمَ وَعَلـى آلِ إبْراهيم، إِنَّكَ حَمـيدٌ مَجـيد
translations.en: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on Ibrahim and on the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ صَلِّ عَلـى مُحمَّـدٍ وَعَلـى أَزْواجِـهِ وَذُرِّيَّـتِه، كَمـا صَلَّيْـتَ عَلـى آلِ إبْراهـيم . وَبارِكْ عَلـى مُحمَّـدٍ وَعَلـى أَزْواجِـهِ وَذُرِّيَّـتِه، كَمـا بارِكْتَ عَلـى آلِ إبْراهـيم . إِنَّكَ حَمـيدٌ مَجـيد
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and upon his wives and progeny as You have bestowed Your favor upon the family of Ibrahim. And bless Muhammad and his wives and progeny as You have blessed the family of Ibrahim, You are full of praise, Most Glorious.
adhkar.benefitAr: الصلاة على النبي في الصلاة
adhkar.benefitEn: Salawat in prayer

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر، وَمِـنْ عَذابِ جَهَـنَّم، وَمِـنْ فِتْـنَةِ المَحْـيا وَالمَمـات، وَمِـنْ شَـرِّ فِتْـنَةِ المَسيحِ الدَّجّال
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and from the punishment of Hell-fire, and from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of the trial of the False Messiah.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر ، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ فِتْـنَةِ المَسيحِ الدَّجّـال ، أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِـنْ فِتْـنَةِ المَحْـيا وَالمَمـات . اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنَ المَأْثَـمِ وَالمَغْـرَم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي ظَلَـمْتُ نَفْسـي ظُلْمـاً كَثـيراً وَلا يَغْـفِرُ الذُّنـوبَ إِلاّ أَنْت، فَاغْـفِر لي مَغْـفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْـدِك وَارْحَمْـني، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الغَـفورُ الرَّحـيم
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself, and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ اغْـفِرْ لي ما قَدَّمْـتُ وَما أَخَّرْت ، وَما أَسْـرَرْتُ وَما أَعْلَـنْت ، وَما أَسْـرَفْت ، وَما أَنْتَ أَعْـلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي . أَنْتَ المُقَـدِّمُ، وَأَنْتَ المُـؤَخِّـرُ لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْـت
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess, and what You are better aware of than I. You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays. There is none worthy of worship but You.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

translations.ko: 오 알라여, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess, and what You are better aware of than I. translations.zh-Hans: 安拉啊, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess, and what You are better aware of than I. translations.zh-Hant: 安拉啊, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess, and what You are better aware of than I. adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَعوذُ بِكَ مِنَ البُخْـل، وَأَعوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الجُـبْن، وَأَعوذُ بِكَ مِنْ أَنْ أُرَدَّ إِلى أَرْذَلِ الـعُمُر، وَأََعوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَـةِ الدُّنْـيا وَعَـذابِ القَـبْر
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I seek Your protection from miserliness, I seek Your protection from cowardice, and I seek Your protection from being returned to feeble old age. I seek Your protection from the trials of this world and from the torment of the grave.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

adhkar.textAr: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ الجَـنَّةَ وأََعوذُ بِـكَ مِـنَ الـنّار
adhkar.textEn: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise, and I seek Your protection from the Fire.
adhkar.benefitAr: بعد التشهد قبل التسليم
adhkar.benefitEn: After Tashahhud before Salam

translations.ar: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُـكَ الجَـنَّةَ وأََعوذُ بِـكَ مِـنَ الـنّار

translations.ku: خوایە, I ask You for بەهەشت, and I seek Your protection from the دۆزەخ.
translations.sw: Ee Allah, I ask You for Pepo, and I seek Your protection from the Moto.
translations.ha: Ya Allah, I ask You for Aljanna, and I seek Your protection from the Wuta.
translations.so: Allaahow, I ask You for Jannada, and I seek Your protection from the Naarta.
translations.am: አላህ ሆይ, I ask You for ገነት, and I seek Your protection from the እሳት.

translations.el: Ω Αλλάχ, I ask You for Παράδεισος, and I seek Your protection from the Φωτιά.

translations.tl: O Allah, I ask You for Paraiso, and I seek Your protection from the Apoy.
translations.ja: アッラーよ, I ask You for 楽園, and I seek Your protection from the 火獄.
translations.ko: 오 알라여, I ask You for 천국, and I seek Your protection from the 불.
translations.zh-Hans: 安拉啊, I ask You for 天堂, and I seek Your protection from the 火狱.
translations.zh-Hant: 安拉啊, I ask You for 天堂, and I seek Your protection from the 火獄.
translations.ps: الهي, I ask You for جنت, and I seek Your protection from the دوزخ.
translations.uz: Allohim, I ask You for Jannat, and I seek Your protection from the Do'zax.
translations.kk: Аллахым, I ask You for Жәннат, and I seek Your protection from the Тозақ.
translations.az: Allahım, I ask You for Cənnət, and I seek Your protection from the Cəhənnəm.
translations.fil: O Allah, I ask You for Paraiso, and I seek Your protection from the Apoy.
translations.jv: Dhuh Allah, I ask You for Suwarga, and I seek Your protection from the Neraka.
translations.ml: അല്ലാഹുവേ, I ask You for സ്വർഗം, and I seek Your protection from the നരകം.
translations.my: အလ္လာဟ်ရှင်, I ask You for ဂန္တဝင်ဘုံ, and I seek Your protection from the မီးငရဲ.

translations.ta: அல்லாஹ்வே, I ask You for சொர்க்கம், and I seek Your protection from the நரகம்.
